1b1('bum): /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya //bam pong gnyis pa/
1b2('bum): ba ni so rol kyi po po phyi'o/ bya
1b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yung byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpe' tshon po/de shes rab kyi pha rol
1b4('bum): tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
2a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/spyong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
2a2('bum): pal spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/skye mched drug phyi
2a3('bum): bya zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyi
2a4('bum): rloms mosasu byed de//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
2a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba med par/skye mched drug phyi nong stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
2b1('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu//
2b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmyigs
2b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
2b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
2b5('bum): la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
2b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par skye mched drug don dam pa stong pazhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs po'i tshul
3a1('bum): gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
3a3('bum): bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
3a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched
3a5('bum): drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
3a6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
3b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa
3b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
3b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
3b4('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
3b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
3b6('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
3b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs po'i tshul gyis rang
4a1('bum): /bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
4a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul
4a3('bum): gyis chos thams cad skyong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
4a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
4a5('bum): tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
4a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs po'i tshul
4a7('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
4b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
4b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
4b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
4b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
4b5('bum): par/skye mched drug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
4b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
4b7('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis na ngo stong
5a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
5a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
5a3('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
5a4('bum): ba med par/reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyiso phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
5a5('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa stong pa
5a6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
5a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
5b1('bum): de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
5b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa
5b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
5b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
5b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
5b6('bum): reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
5b7('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa mtha' las 'das pa
6a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
6a2('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa
6a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
6a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
6a5('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
6a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
6a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
6b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa
6b2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
6b3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
6b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg
6b5('bum): pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
6b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang
6b7('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
7a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
7a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
7a4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
7a5('bum): dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba nang stong pa
7a6('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
7a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
7b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
7b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
7b3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor
7b4('bum): ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
7b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
7b6('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
7b7('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
8a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
8a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa
8a3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
8a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
8a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
8a6('bum): myong bar/tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//dmi gas pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//
8a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
8b1('bum): bya ba med par/tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/skyong
8b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor
8b3('bum): ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
8b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
8b5('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
8b6('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
8b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
9a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med par/tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gA martan//
9a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
9a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
9a4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
9a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
9a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor
9a7('bum): ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
9b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya/
9b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor
9b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
9b4('bum): ba med par/skyed pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
9b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//
9b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
9b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
10a1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
10a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
10a3('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred
10a4('bum): pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
10a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
10a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
10a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
10b1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
10b2('bum): med par/sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
10b3('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa mtha' las 'das pa
10b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
10b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
10b6('bum): dedamigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
10b7('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba
11a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
11a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
11a3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa
11a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
11a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
11a6('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rong gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
11a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
11b1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
11b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
11b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa ngo bo nyid stong
11b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
11b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sred pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
11b6('bum): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11b7('bum): po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lon pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
12a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
12a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
12a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len
12a4('bum): pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
12a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
12a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
12a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
12b1('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len
12b2('bum): pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
12b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
12b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
12b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
12b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa
12b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
13a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
13a2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
13a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
13a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo ro ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
13a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
13a6('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
13a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/len pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
13b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa rang gi
13b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
13b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
13b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
13b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
13b6('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
13b7('bum): len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
14a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya/
14a2('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan
14a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
14a4('bum): srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
14a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
14a6('bum): gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
14a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
14b1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa stong pa nyid skyong ba
14b2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/sbyong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
14b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
14b4('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
14b5('bum): med par/srid pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
14b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
14b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
15a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
15a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
15a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
15a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
15a5('bum): srid pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
15a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skyid pa dor ba
15a7('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
15b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba meng bar/srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
15b2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
15b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
15b4('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
15b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
15b6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/srid
15b7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
16a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa dngos po med pa stong
16a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
16a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//
16a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
16a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/srid pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul
16a6('bum): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16a7('bum): chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar
16b1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
16b2('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid
16b3('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
16b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
16b5('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba stong pa nyid stong
16b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
16b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
17a1('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
17a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
17a3('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
17a4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
17a5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba 'dus
17a6('bum): ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
17a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
17b1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
17b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
17b3('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
17b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
17b5('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
17b6('bum): bya ba med par/skye ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
17b7('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes
18a1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
18a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
18a3('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
18a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
18a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
18a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
18a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
18b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
18b2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/skye
18b3('bum): ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
18b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
18b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
18b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
18b7('bum): rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
19a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
19a2('bum): de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
19a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
19a4('bum): skyong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
19a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
19a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
19a7('bum): rga shi don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
19b1('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
19b2('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
19b3('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi 'dus ma byas sbyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
19b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
19b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
19b6('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
19b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/rga shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
20a1('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
20a2('bum): la bya ba med par/rga shi dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
20a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi rang
20a4('bum): bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
20a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi chos thams cad stong po zhes bya bar
20a6('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
20a7('bum): phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
20b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
20b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
20b3('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
20b4('bum): bya ba med par/rga shi dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
20b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi ngo bo nyid
20b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
20b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
21a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'gyur
21a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
21a3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/dran pa nye bar bzhag
21a4('bum): pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
21a5('bum): par/yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dgo par spong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom
21a6('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
21a7('bum): pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
21b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dbang po rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dang /
21b2('bum): bopo de dag kyang dmigs la/dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
21b3('bum): da ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/stobs rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
21b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom ste/dmigs
21b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
21b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags
21b7('bum): bo'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmigs la/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
22a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs
22a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'phags po'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs la/'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
22a3('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/bsam gtan rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gton de dag kyang
22a4('bum): dmigs la/bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
22a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshad med pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom
22a6('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs med pa'i
22a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
22b1('bum): 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
22b2('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang dmigs la/rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
22b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/
22b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems
22b5('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
22b6('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
22b7('bum): de dag kyang dmigs la/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
23a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom ste/
23a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmigs la/mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
23a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag
23a4('bum): kyong dmigs la/ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
23a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom s+ho/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis
23a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/de bzhin
23a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de
23b1('bum): dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mi 'jigs
23b2('bum): pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
23b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmigs la/so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod
23b5('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/snying rje chen po bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de'ang dmigs la
23b6('bum): snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
23b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom ste/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
24a1('bum): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nga gsum pa//rab 'byor/
24a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
24a3('bum): po 'di thos na/'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro//gsol po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/sdig pa'i
24a4('bum): grogs pos yongs su zin cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/'jigs shing dadangs la skrag par 'gyur te/sdig pa'i grogs po'i
24a5('bum): sug par lhung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni/shes rab
24a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o///
24a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed
24b1('bum): 'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par
24b2('bum): byed pa ste/'di ni de bzhin gshogs pas gsungs pa ma yin/'di ni chos ma yin/'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o//mdo sde 'di
24b3('bum): ngag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o//gzung bar mi bya'o//bcang bar mi bya'o//klag par mi bya'o//kun chub par mi bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid
24b4('bum): la mi bya'o//'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor
24b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b6('bum): chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/bsam
24b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas
25a1('bum): khyod la ci zhig bya/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya
25a2('bum): zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
25a3('bum): bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i
25a4('bum): mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes
25a5('bum): pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to//'grel to rnam par 'byed
25a6('bum): do//gsal bar byed do//yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi
25a7('bum): las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/
25b1('bum): /'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/khyod ni phyir mi ldogs pa 'du ma yin/khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
25b2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dge mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
25b3('bum): pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi tsha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
25b4('bum): du phyin te/'di skad du rigs kyi bu/gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //'du shes ni bdag gam bdag
25b5('bum): gis stong ngo //'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
25b6('bum): rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //sna ni bdag gam bdag gis sbyong ngo //lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
25b7('bum): yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
26a1('bum): ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //chos ni bdag gram bdag gis stong ngo //mig gi rnam par shes pa
26a2('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //lce'i rnam
26a3('bum): par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
26a4('bum): stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gram bdag gis stong ngo //sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag
26a5('bum): gum bdag gis stong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //yid kyi 'dus
26a6('bum): te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gum bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
26a7('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam
26b1('bum): bdag gis stong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis
26b2('bum): stong ngo //sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rlung
26b3('bum): gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
26b4('bum): ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //ming dang gzugs ni
26b5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //skye mched drug ni bdag gram bdag gis stong ngo //reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
26b6('bum): ngongo/sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //len pa ni bdag gram bdag gis stong ngo //srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis
26b7('bum): stong ngo //rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam
27a1('bum): bdag gis spyong ngo //bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gos skyong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byadag gam bdag gis
27a2('bum): skyong ngo //bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //nang stong pa nyid
27a3('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //stong pa nyid stong pa
27a4('bum): nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dron dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //'dus
27a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
27a6('bum): bdag gis stong ngo //thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rang
27a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
27b1('bum): bdag gis stong ngo //mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa
27b2('bum): nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag
27b3('bum): gis stong ngo //yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis sbyong ngo //rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //dbang po rnams ni bdag
27b4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo //stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //'phags pa'i lam yan
27b5('bum): lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
27b6('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag
27b7('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo //mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang
28a1('bum): smon pa med pa ni bdug gam bdag gis stong ngo //mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gram
28a2('bum): bdag gis stong ngo //gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //mi 'jigs/
28a3('bum): pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
28a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //de ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
28a5('bum): mngon par sangs rgyas te/de'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
28a6('bum): grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du
28a7('bum): phyin te/'di skad du rigs kyi bu/shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/'di la
28b1('bum): sbyangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med do//byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do//nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do//de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byung
28b2('bum): phyogs dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang steng dag kyang stong ste/phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
28b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med/nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang
28b4('bum): med do//zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor
28b5('bum): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
28b6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa
28b7('bum): 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang /slob dpon gyi
29a1('bum): cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing /rnam pa thams
29a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
29a3('bum): rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang /stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
29a4('bum): lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang /'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang /tshad med po rnams la sbyor ba dang /gzugs
29a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
29a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/nyan thos kyis
29a7('bum): mngon du gyis shig/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra ma ston pa 'di ni/byang chub
29b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems
29b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/khyod la ci zhig bya/
29b3('bum): de'i don du ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshod med pas/nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i
29b4('bum): 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang /dgra bcom pa'i
29b5('bum): 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
29b6('bum): po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29b7('bum): chen po'i drung du phyin te/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /
30a1('bum): zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma mod ces bya ba dang /smyon pa myod ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
30a2('bum): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag
30a3('bum): med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan mo med ces bya ba dang /smyon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
30a4('bum): ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /'du shes sdug bsngal
30a5('bum): zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /sbyong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par
30a6('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /'du byed
30a7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon
30b1('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /rnam
30b2('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces
30b3('bum): bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
30b4('bum): dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med
30b5('bum): ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /rna ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes
30b6('bum): bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs
30b7('bum): po'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /sna mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma
31a1('bum): mod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya bu med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
31a2('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med
31a3('bum): ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /lus mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
31a4('bum): dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
31a5('bum): bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes
31a6('bum): bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs
31a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /
31b1('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /sgra mi rtag ces/
31b2('bum): bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
31b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /dri mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdog med ces
31b4('bum): bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes
31b5('bum): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis smyon pa dang /ro mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang
31b6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /reg mi
31b7('bum): rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces
32a1('bum): bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug
32a2('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon
32a3('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
32a4('bum): dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'dre bya ba med
32a5('bum): ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces
32a6('bum): bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben
32a7('bum): zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba
32b1('bum): dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
32b2('bum): pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med
32b3('bum): ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag
32b4('bum): ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
32b5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
32b6('bum): bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
32b7('bum): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag mod ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes
33a1('bum): bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes
33a2('bum): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /
