79b4('bum): rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//'phags
79b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams skye ba med pa la
79b6('bum): gnas med do//bsam gtan rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//bsam gtan rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas
79b7('bum): med do//bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//bsam gtan rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//bsam gtan rnams
80a1('bum): mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas med do//tshad med pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//chang //
80a2('bum): med pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//tshad med pa
80a3('bum): rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba med pa
80a4('bum): la gnas med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kun nas nyon
80a5('bum): mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//
80a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab
80a7('bum): 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs
80b1('bum): pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la
80b2('bum): gnas med do//rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//
80b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
80b4('bum): dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//mthar gyis gnas
80b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor rnam
80b6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
80b7('bum): pa med pa 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par
81a1('bum): byang ba med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas
81a2('bum): med do//rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//rnam par thar bya'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
81a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//mngon par shes pa
81a4('bum): rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//mngon par shes pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//mngon par shes
81a5('bum): pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa la
81a6('bum): gnas med do//rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kun nas
81a7('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams
81b1('bum): 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyo ba med pa la gnas med do//gzungs kyi sgo
81b2('bum): rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams
81b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab
81b4('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//de bzhin gshegs
81b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med po dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la
81b6('bum): gnas med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa la go nas med do//
81b7('bum): rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs
82a1('bum): pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams
82a2('bum): 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do///
82a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la
82a4('bum): gnas med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//
82a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor byams pa chen po skye ba med pa la gnas med do//byams pa chen po 'gag pa med pa la
82a6('bum): gnas med do//byams pa chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//byams pa chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas
82a7('bum): med do//byams pa chen po 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor snying rje chen po skye ba med pa la gnas
82b1('bum): med do//snying rje chen po 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//snying rje chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//snying rje chen po
82b2('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//snying rje chen po 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi
82b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kun
82b4('bum): nus nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do//sangs rgyas
82b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzugs
82b6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//'du shes shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
82b7('bum): gnas med do//'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor
83a1('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor
83a2('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/mig shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rna ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sna shin tu rnam par dag
83a3('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//lce shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//lus shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//yid shin
83a4('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
83a5('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sgra shin tu rnam par dag pa la
83a6('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//dri shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//ro shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//reg shin tu
83a7('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//chos shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
83b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par
83b2('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la
83b3('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
83b4('bum): gnas med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
83b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
83b6('bum): ma'i gnas med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
83b7('bum): do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//yid
84a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
84a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par
84a3('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
84a4('bum): gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//
84a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa
84a6('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
84a7('bum): tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lto ste dper na/sa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//chu'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la
84b1('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//me'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rlung gi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//
84b2('bum): nam mkha'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de
84b3('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ma
84b4('bum): rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//'du byed shin tu rnam por dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
84b5('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//ming dang gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//skye mched drug shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
84b6('bum): do//reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sred pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la
84b7('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//len pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//srid pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//skye ba
85a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rga shi shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems//
85a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
85a3('bum): phrag brgya pa//bam pong drug pa//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//tshul
85a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//
85a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
85a6('bum): med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
85a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
85b1('bum): ma'i gnas med do//phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//stong pa nyid
85b2('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//chen po stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu
85b3('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag
85b4('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
85b5('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la
85b6('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la
85b7('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
86a1('bum): ma'i gnas med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//dngos po med pa'ang ba nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam
86a2('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
86a3('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//yang dag par spong ba shin tu
86a4('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//dbang po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
86a5('bum): ma'i gnas med do//stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//byang chub kyi yan lag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//
86a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lamra yan lag brgyad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
86a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'phags pa'i bden pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
86b1('bum): ma'i gnas med do//bsam gtan shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//tshad med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//gzugs
86b2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rnam par thar pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//mthar
86b3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
86b4('bum): pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//mngon par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par dag pa
86b5('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//gzungs kyi sgo shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
86b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu rnam par
86b7('bum): dag pa la mtshan mi'i gnas med do//mi 'jigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//so so yang dag par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la
87a1('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do//snying rje chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par
87a2('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
87a3('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/bdag med pa'i phyir/bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor
87a4('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
87a5('bum): dper na/sems can med pa'i phyir/sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa lo mtshan mi'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
87a6('bum): chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/srog med pa'i phyir/srog
87a7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
87b1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gso ba med pa'i phyir/gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//
87b2('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
87b3('bum): dper na/skyes bu med pa'i phyir/skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes
87b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gang zag med pa'i phyir/gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa
87b5('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
87b6('bum): med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ni/shed can med pa'i phyir/shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
87b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/shed bdag med
88a1('bum): pa'i phyir/shed bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
88a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/byed pa po med pa'i phyir/byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag
88a3('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
88a4('bum): gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshor ba po med pa'i phyir/tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
88a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/shes pa po
88a6('bum): med pa'i phyir/shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
88a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/mthong ba po shin tu rnam par
88b1('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
88b2('bum): tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/mun pa'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
88b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/bskal pa'i me
88b4('bum): 'bar ba'i tshe//'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
88b5('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
88b6('bum): tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
88b7('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la'akhrug
89a1('bum): pa'i gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
89a2('bum): gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin goshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab lo/shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas
89a3('bum): med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab
89a4('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do//rab 'byor
89a5('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na//
89a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par ma grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i
89a7('bum): gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
89b1('bum): do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89b2('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gza' dang /skar ma dang /nor bu rin po che dang /glog gi 'od la gnas med
89b3('bum): do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab
89b4('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
89b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//
89b6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta
89b7('bum): ste dper na/mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
90a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du
90a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'phrul
90a3('bum): dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
90a4('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
90a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
90a6('bum): kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
90a7('bum): gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas
90b2('bum): med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor
90b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
90b4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
90b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/chung snang gi lha
90b6('bum): rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub se mos dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
90b7('bum): tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi
91a2('bum): 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
91a3('bum): med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
91a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/chung dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de
91a5('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na//
91a6('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
91a7('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
91b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas
91b2('bum): med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor
91b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
91b4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
91b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gnas gtsang ma'i
91b6('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i byang chub sems
91b7('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
92a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
92a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
92a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /byang chub
92a4('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/gzugs
92a5('bum): med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
92a6('bum): pos/chos thams cad kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o//gsol pa/
92a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par
92b1('bum): bgyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni
92b2('bum): dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /lung du bstan pa dang /lung du ma bstan pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa
92b3('bum): med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /thun mong dang /thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/rab 'byor
92b4('bum): de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /chos de dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor byang
92b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba'ang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags//
92b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/phar shes pa/mar shes pa/dge sbyong du shes pa/bram zer shes pa/
92b7('bum): rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang /sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod
93a1('bum): nams bya ba'i las kyi dngos po nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/'di
93a2('bum): ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /'bu can gyi 'du shes dang /rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /rnam par sngos pa'i 'du
93a3('bum): shes dang /rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /rus pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /'jig rten pa'i
93a4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/
93a5('bum): 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha
93a6('bum): rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/de dag
93a7('bum): ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi dge
93b1('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab
93b2('bum): 'byor 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor brdzun du smra ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
93b3('bum): mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor tshig kyal pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor chags sems ni 'jig
93b4('bum): rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//rab 'byor log par lta ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//khro ba dang /mdud
93b5('bum): par 'dzin pa dang /'chab pa dang /'tshig pa dang /'tshe ba dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /nga rgyal dang /log pa'i nga rgyal te/rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
93b6('bum): mi dge ba'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//
93b7('bum): ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//skye
94a1('bum): mchod drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//khams
94a2('bum): rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan
94a3('bum): pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos
94a4('bum): zhes bya ba ni/phung po lnga dang /skye mched bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa
94a5('bum): bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin pa//
94a6('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/bcom
94a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang
94b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
94b2('bum): po nyid dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /mi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang /yongs su shes
94b3('bum): pa'i dbang po dang /yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang /rtog pa dang bcas/dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge
94b4('bum): 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhin dang /tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang //
94b5('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad de/brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol
94b6('bum): gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las
94b7('bum): yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha'
95a1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang
95a2('bum): dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa thams
95a3('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar
95a4('bum): pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
95a5('bum): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'i//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba
95a6('bum): 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyud pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
95a7('bum): dgu ste/dgu gang zhe ni/'di lta ste/de 'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes
95b1('bum): pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/nang yongs su dang ste/sems
95b2('bum): kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
95b3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags
95b4('bum): pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o//zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
95b5('bum): te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med
95b6('bum): pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas/yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
95b7('bum): dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha'
96a1('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par
96a2('bum): shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
96a3('bum): 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag
96a4('bum): par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes mod min skye mched las
96a5('bum): yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang /
96a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas
96a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang //
96b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid
96b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
96b3('bum): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
96b4('bum): 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/'di lta ste/phung po lnga dang /
96b5('bum): skye mched bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes
96b6('bum): po lnga dag ste/de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
96b7('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang
97a1('bum): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa
97a2('bum): brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
97a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
97a4('bum): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos
97a5('bum): gang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med
97a6('bum): pa'i khams dang /gzhan yang de ma yin pa/'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
97a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i
97b1('bum): bden pa bcu dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
97b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
97b3('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so/
97b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o//
97b5('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/gang la skye ba med cing
97b6('bum): 'jig pa med pa dang /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/'dod chags zad pa/zhe sdang zad pa/gti mug zad pa/de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid//
97b7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/chos nyid/chos kyi dbyings/chos skyon med pa nyid/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/rab 'byor de
98a1('bum): ngag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
98a2('bum): 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lja dag ste/
98a3('bum): de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang /thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos zhes bya ba gang lags/bcom ldan
98a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
98a5('bum): dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden po bzhi dang /rnam par
98a6('bum): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad
98a7('bum): dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po
98b1('bum): dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98b2('bum): chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o//chos thams cad gnyis
98b3('bum): su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing /rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das
98b4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
98b5('bum): zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
98b6('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par
98b7('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni//
99a1('bum): rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs
99a2('bum): rgyas dang /sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dge ste/rab
99a3('bum): 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro//de la byang chub sems dpa'
99a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyod de/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems
99a5('bum): bskyed pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/'khor ba dpag
99a6('bum): tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgro bar bya'o//bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o//bodag gis sems can
99a7('bum): thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o//bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o//de ltar sems
99b1('bum): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa bdag
99b2('bum): gis shes par bya'o//bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o//bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi
99b3('bum): rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o//bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o//bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su
99b4('bum): bsgrub par bslab par bya'o//snyam du sems bskyed de/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/de la gnas shing /byang
99b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
99b6('bum): dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/sems can dmyal ba pa dang /byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rton pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor
99b7('bum): ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o//snyam du sems bskyed de/de la
100a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag
100a2('bum): khrig brgya stong mang por/sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/sems can
100a3('bum): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang /bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o//zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/sems can thams cad
100a4('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su
100a5('bum): myong bar bya'o//de nas gzod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod de/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/bla na med
100a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
100a7('bum): po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul
100b1('bum): gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis/sems can thams cad
100b2('bum): kyi phul du 'gyur ba/de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/sems dang po bskyed
100b3('bum): phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/gti mug gi sems mi skyed/gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/rang sangs
100b4('bum): rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o//des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang /sems rlabs po
100b5('bum): che des rlom sems su mi bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par byas te/de la byang chub sems dpa'
100b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing /des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
100b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o//des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
101a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
101a2('bum): chen po'i phan pa dang /bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med
101a3('bum): pa ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul
101a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o//chos
101a5('bum): la dga' bar bya'o//chos la mos par bya'o//chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o//de la chos gang zhe na/chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/'di
101a6('bum): ni chos zhes bya'o//de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o//de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/gang
101a7('bum): chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o//de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/
101b1('bum): 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o//de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/'di ni chos lA mos pa'i rnang
101b2('bum): 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sems can gyi phung po chen po
101b3('bum): nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/nang stong
101b4('bum): pa nyid la gnas/phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/don dam pa stong pa
101b5('bum): nyid la gnas/'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
101b6('bum): pa nyid la gnas/dere ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas//
101b7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/sems
102a1('bum): can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
102a2('bum): pa la spyod pas/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas/yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/dbang po rnams la
102a3('bum): gnas/stobs rnams la gnas/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/'phags pa'i bden pa
102a4('bum): rnams la gnas/bsam gtan rnams la gnas/tshad med pa rnams la gnas/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/rnam par thar pa
102a5('bum): rnams la gnas/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
102a6('bum): med pa la gnas/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
102a7('bum): stobs rnams la gnas/mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/byams pa chen po la gnas/snying rje chen po la
102b1('bum): gnas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan
102b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge
102b3('bum): 'dzin la gnas/seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin lnga gnas/zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos
102b4('bum): thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
102b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos thams cad la
102b6('bum): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ting nge 'dzin rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dpung
102b7('bum): rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas//
103a1('bum): tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/phyogs su rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i
103a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nam mkha'
103a3('bum): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dbang
103a4('bum): po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/snrel zhi'i ting nge
103a5('bum): 'dzin la gnas/nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gnas
103a6('bum): la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'od mtha' yas pa'i
103a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'od dri ma med
103b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/mi 'pham
103b2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'jig pa
103b3('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/snang
103b4('bum): ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas//
103b5('bum): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
103b6('bum): rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dga' ba spong ba'i
103b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge
104a1('bum): 'dzin la gnas/yi gro mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la granas/yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge
104a2('bum): 'dzin la gnas/'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gnas
104a3('bum): med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
104a4('bum): gnas/yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
104a5('bum): gnas/dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge
104a6('bum): 'dzin la gnas/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge
104a7('bum): 'dzin la gnas/nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
104b1('bum): gnas/rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rnam pa 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rtogs
104b2('bum): pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin
104b3('bum): la gnas/sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas//
104b4('bum): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/zad mi shes
104b5('bum): pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
104b6('bum): 'gral ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/'od dri ma med
104b7('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la
105a1('bum): gnas/rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting rje
105a2('bum): 'dzin la gnas/rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
105a3('bum): gnas/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i
105a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ngag gi
105a5('bum): skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
105a6('bum): gonas te/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
105a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b1('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nga bdun pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
105b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spongs
105b3('bum): pa skye'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig/shA
105b4('bum): radwa ti'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
105b5('bum): srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /shed can tu lta ba rab tu
105b6('bum): spang ba dang /shid bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /slong ba por lta ba rab tu
105b7('bum): spang ba dang /yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /tshor du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /shes pa por lta ba
106a1('bum): rab tu spang ba dang /mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /yod par lta
106a2('bum): ba rab tu spang ba dang /med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang
106a3('bum): ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /stong pa nyid
106a4('bum): du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab
106a5('bum): tu spang ba dang /dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /'phags pa'i lam
106a6('bum): yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /tshad med par lta ba rab tu
106a7('bum): spang ba dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
106b1('bum): par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med par lta ba rab tu sbyang ba dang /mngon par shes par lta
106b2('bum): ba rab tu spang ba dang /ting nge 'dzin du lta bu rab tu spang ba dang /gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
106b3('bum): mi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu sbyang ba dang /so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu
106b4('bum): spang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya
106b5('bum): pa lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang
106b6('bum): ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid
106b7('bum): kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de//de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa
107a1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar
107a2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/'du shes smra lta bar 'gyur ba yin/'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba
107a3('bum): yin/mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yid
107a4('bum): dulta bar 'gyur ba yin/gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ror lta bar 'gyur ba yin/reg tu lta bar
107a5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sna'i rnam
107a6('bum): par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yid kyi rnam par
107a7('bum): shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sna'i 'dus te reg par lta
107b1('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba 'o na/mogag
107b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
107b3('bum): bAbar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yid
107b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/me'i khams su lta bar
107b5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin//
107b6('bum): ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ming dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/skye
107b7('bum): mched drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sred par lta bar 'gyur pa yin/len par lta bar 'gyur
108a1('bum): ba yin/srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
108a2('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bor 'gyur ba yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
108a3('bum): tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/nang stong
108a4('bum): pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur
108a5('bum): ba yin/chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/'dus ma byas
108a6('bum): stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/dor ba
108a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rang gi mtshan
108b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
108b2('bum): du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yang dag par spong bar lta bar
108b3('bum): 'gyur ba yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar
108b4('bum): 'gyur ba yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin
108b5('bum): tshad med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mthar gyis gnas
108b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mngon par
108b7('bum): shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin//
109a1('bum): mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/snying rje chen por lta
109a2('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
109a3('bum): su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/dge 'dun du
109a4('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab
109a5('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs
109a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//'du shes su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
109a7('bum): 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mig tu dmigs shing
109b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do//rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//snar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do//
109b2('bum): lcer dmigs shing dmigs po'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
109b3('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//drir
109b4('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//ror dmigs shing dmigs po'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do//reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
109b5('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do//chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do///
109b6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba spyod do//sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lha bo skyed
109b7('bum): do//lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigase shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
110a1('bum): lta ba skyed do//yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs
110a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
110a3('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do//lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
110a4('bum): skyed do//yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
110a5('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing
110a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
110a7('bum): tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sa'i khams
110b1('bum): su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do//me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs par
110b2('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
110b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//'du byed du dmigs
110b4('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//ming dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
110b5('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//tshor bar
110b6('bum): dmigs shing drimigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sbed par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
110b7('bum): skyed do//srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rga shir dmigs shing
111a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
111a2('bum): phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//brtson 'grus kyi pha
111a3('bum): rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
111a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//phyi stong
111a5('bum): pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
111a6('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do//don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs
111a7('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs
111b1('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
111b2('bum): du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs
111b3('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs
111b4('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyong do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs
111b5('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyong ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs
111b6('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba spyod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bo skyed do//yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs
111b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
112a1('bum): stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//'phags
112a2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lte ba skyed do//'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lci bskyed do//
112a3('bum): bsam gtan du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//tshad mod par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
112a4('bum): par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bo skyed do//rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mthar gyis gnas
112a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma mod pa dang /smon pa med
112a6('bum): par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mngon par shes por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing
112a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//gzungs kyi sgor dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//de bzhin gshogs pa'i stobs su dmigs shing
112b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//mi 'jigs par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//so so yang dag par rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
112b2('bum): skyed do//byams pa chen por dmigos shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//snying rje chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
112b3('bum): 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sangs rgyas
112b4('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//byang chub tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//sangs rgyas su dmigs
112b5('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
112b6('bum): skyed do//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bor dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
