150a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis
150a4('bum): rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
150a5('bum): pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
150a6('bum): bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
150a7('bum): rjes su sgrog go/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
150b1('bum): ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do//'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can
150b2('bum): yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/shar lho'i phyogs
150b3('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad
150b4('bum): de/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs
150b5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
150b6('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams che
150b7('bum): ge mo zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
151a1('bum): byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
151a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams tshi ge
151a3('bum): mi zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
151a4('bum): su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
151a5('bum): na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/byang
151a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu
151a7('bum): 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas
151b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams che go mo zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
151b2('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra
151b3('bum): brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
151b4('bum): zhes bya/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
151b5('bum): chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang
151b6('bum): bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nang
151b7('bum): yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis
152a1('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis
152a2('bum): myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
152a3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med
152a4('bum): pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med
152a5('bum): pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
152a6('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs
152a7('bum): med po/gnod pa med pa/ltong pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i
152b1('bum): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med
152b2('bum): pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
152b3('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/
152b4('bum): tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas
152b5('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mes par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i
152b6('bum): 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
152b7('bum): gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
153a1('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i
153a2('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi
153a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
153a4('bum): bsam gtan 'di dag dang /tshad med pa 'di dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /
153a5('bum): rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
153a6('bum): de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa
153a7('bum): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba con bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/
153b1('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
153b2('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa
153b3('bum): rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so///
153b4('bum): de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms dang
153b5('bum): dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa//
153b6('bum): gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
153b7('bum): par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa
154a1('bum): med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
154a2('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod
154a3('bum): pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
154a4('bum): bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/
154a5('bum): gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas
154a6('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs
154a7('bum): pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
154b1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas
154b2('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i
154b3('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi
154b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
154b5('bum): bsam gtan 'di dag dang /tshad med pa 'di dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par
154b6('bum): ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de bzod pa'i
154b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
155a1('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi
155a2('bum): rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
155a3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags
155a4('bum): pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
155a5('bum): gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa//
155a6('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/
155a7('bum): gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
155b1('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod
155b2('bum): pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/
155b3('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa
155b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam
155b5('bum): par spyod do//de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshod med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod po med pa/ltong
155b6('bum): pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par
155b7('bum): byas shing rnam par spyod do//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs
156a1('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams
156a2('bum): cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
156a3('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de
156a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
156a5('bum): so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /tshad med pa 'di
156a6('bum): dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa thams cad
156a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
156b1('bum): 'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po
156b2('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam
156b3('bum): par dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral
156b4('bum): bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa/btang
156b5('bum): snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang //
156b6('bum): yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang
156b7('bum): ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas//
157a1('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje/
157a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms
157a3('bum): pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang
157a4('bum): ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms
157a5('bum): pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de mi dmigs
157a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs
157a7('bum): su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing
157b1('bum): rnam par spyod do//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi
157b2('bum): byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
157b3('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
157b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad
157b5('bum): med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'di ni byang chub sems
157b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /tshad med pa 'di dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa
157b7('bum): 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni//
158a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /'dod pas dpon/sdig/
158a2('bum): to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te
158a3('bum): gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod
158a4('bum): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas
158a5('bum): dran pa dang ldan zhing /shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyi myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang
158a6('bum): snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde
158a7('bum): ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
158b1('bum): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms
158b2('bum): pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i
158b3('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi
158b4('bum): dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin
158b5('bum): tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
158b6('bum): kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i
158b7('bum): sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig
159a1('bum): rnon chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de rnam pa thams
159a2('bum): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha'
159a3('bum): yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te//
159a4('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
159a5('bum): 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te//
159a6('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te//
159a7('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan 'di dag dang /tshad med pa 'di dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /tshul
159b1('bum): dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
159b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang
159b3('bum): bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang
159b4('bum): yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan
159b5('bum): gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la
159b6('bum): 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
159b7('bum): so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms
160a1('bum): dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med
160a2('bum): pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nAm mkha'i mthas
160a3('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad
160a4('bum): med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa steshin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i
160a5('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad
160a6('bum): med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhong pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs po/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas
160a7('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/
160b1('bum): mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam
160b2('bum): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/
160b3('bum): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
160b4('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye
160b5('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched de la
160b6('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i
160b7('bum): tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
161a1('bum): 'di dag dang /tshad med pa 'di dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog
161a2('bum): cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
161a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
161a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/
161a5('bum): lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/
161a6('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa
161a7('bum): med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par
161b1('bum): byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs
161b2('bum): su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing
161b3('bum): rnam par spyod do//de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs
161b4('bum): su rdzogs po/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par
161b5('bum): spyod do//de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa los skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan
161b6('bum): dngo po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/
161b7('bum): rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral
162a1('bum): bas dran pa dang ldan nong shos bzhon du ldang snyoms su gnas to//bde ba lus kyus myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis do la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par/
162a2('bum): dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam btan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
162a3('bum): yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar
162a4('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
162a5('bum): yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
162a6('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
162a7('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med
162b1('bum): pa'i skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes mod 'du shes med min skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tang
162b2('bum): 'dzin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir//
162b3('bum): bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang /skyon cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/
162b4('bum): de dag gi nga ro dang /de dag gi skyon dang /'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems
162b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de
162b6('bum): dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par lhung yang 'di lta ste/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang rung ste/sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni/byang chub sems
162b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
163a1('bum): yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa tsho/'di sgyum ste/sems
163a2('bum): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /mos pa dang /rtog pa dang /sems shing khong du
163a3('bum): chud par byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
163a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/sems can
163a5('bum): thams cad kyi don dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi
163a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang //
163a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang /nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/byang chub
163b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
163b2('bum): bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang /bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang /byams pa dang /snying
163b3('bum): rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med
163b4('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam po dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong po'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med
163b5('bum): pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing /de dag
163b6('bum): gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems
163b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/
164a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul/
164a2('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan log
164a3('bum): bdun bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa
164a4('bum): thams cad du bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
164a5('bum): bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam
164a6('bum): pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang /
164a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
164b1('bum): bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen
164b2('bum): po bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
164b3('bum): shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa
164b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i
164b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do//snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog
164b6('bum): cing /sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do//dga' bo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems
164b7('bum): can rnams la sems so//btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/'di ni byang
165a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'opha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po bsam gtan drug/
165a2('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/nyan thos
165a3('bum): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
165a4('bum): ma nyams pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam
165a5('bum): par spyod cing /sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/byang chub sems
165a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
165a7('bum): ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang /dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa
165b1('bum): 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /
165b2('bum): tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog la/bsam gautan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang
165b3('bum): gis kyang mi skye zhing /de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod
165b4('bum): pa'i bsam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /tshad med
165b5('bum): pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med
165b6('bum): pa'i rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /sbyong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med
165b7('bum): par yang dag par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/byang chub sems
166a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/nang skyong
166a2('bum): pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin//
166a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs
166a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/mtha' las
166a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
166a6('bum): shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
166a7('bum): ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/dngos po med pa stong
166b1('bum): bapa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
166b2('bum): gyis ma yin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
166b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
166b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi
166b5('bum): 'jug/mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang /bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang /bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi
166b6('bum): 'jug/bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang /sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni
166b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
167a1('bum): theg pa chen po ni/'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/'dod pa dang /
167a2('bum): gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
167a3('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'jig rten pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi
167a4('bum): byed/'jig rten las 'das pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas kyi chos dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang /'jig
167a5('bum): rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes
167a6('bum): pa med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji
167a7('bum): tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
167b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs//
167b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/len pa'ang mi dmigs/yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs
167b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
167b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang
167b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol
167b6('bum): tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bzod
167b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /des bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs//
168a1('bum): yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
168a2('bum): dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
168a3('bum): phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/yid
168a4('bum): la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas
168a5('bum): zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
168a6('bum): yang dag par gnas kyang /des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/yid la bya ba
168a7('bum): de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o///
168b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
168b2('bum): des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/mi dge ba dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag
168b3('bum): pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/yid la bya ba de dag
168b4('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan
168b5('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
168b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
168b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
169a1('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i
169a2('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
169a3('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
169a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
169a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
169a6('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las
169a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
169b1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med
169b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
169b3('bum): bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom
169b4('bum): mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo//
169b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mi 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam
169b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa
169b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad
170a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom
170a2('bum): mo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
170a3('bum): bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
170a4('bum): pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
170a5('bum): don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
170a6('bum): du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
170a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang
170b1('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i
170b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
170b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
170b4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i dron du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad
170b5('bum): med pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i
170b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
170b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar
171a1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
171a2('bum): don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
171a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
171a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
171a5('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
171a6('bum): la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
171a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
171b1('bum): la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
171b2('bum): bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
171b3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
171b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/'di ltar byang chub sems
171b5('bum): dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so//gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba
171b6('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
171b7('bum): tsam du zad do//'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
172a1('bum): ming tsam du zad do//mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
172a2('bum): sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sna zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir/lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//lus dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
172a3('bum): lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/gzugs zhes bya ba 'di
172a4('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do//sgra dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//dri dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ro dmigs
172a5('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//reg dmigs su med pa'i phyir/reg ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chos zhes
172a6('bum): bya ba 'di ni mang tsam du zad do//mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
172a7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
172b1('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
172b2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mig gi
172b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya
172b4('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
172b5('bum): lnga'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zad do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//yid kyi 'dus
172b6('bum): te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mig gi
172b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su ming pa'i phyir/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
173a1('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zad do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya//
173a2('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
173a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//yid kyi 'dus te reg
173a4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
173a5('bum): sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chu'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//me'i khams dmigs su med pa'i
173a6('bum): phyir/me'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rlung gi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//nam mkha'i khams
173a7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes
173b1('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni
173b2('bum): ming tsam du zad do//rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ming dang gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ming dang
173b3('bum): gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//skye mched drug dmigs su med pa'i phyir/skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
173b4('bum): reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sred pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sred pa zhes bya ba 'di
173b5('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do//len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//srid pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
173b6('bum): skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rga shi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
173b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
174a1('bum): phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad/
174a2('bum): do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
174a3('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
174a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//phyi stong pa nyid dmigs
174a5('bum): su med pa'i phyir/phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
174a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chen po
174a7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'dus byas
174b1('bum): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces
174b2('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//thog ma dang
174b3('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
174b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsom du zad do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chos
174b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
174b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
174b7('bum): zad do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
175a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
175a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
175a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
175a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//dbang po rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'dri ni ming tsam du zad do//stobs rnams
175a5('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba
175a6('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'phags pa'i lam rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'phags
175a7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/bsam
175b1('bum): gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
175b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
175b3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
175b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam par thar pa'i sgo
175b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mngon par shes pa zhes bya
175b6('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
175b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
176a1('bum): tsam du zad do//mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni med tsam du zad do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
176a2('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//snying rje chen po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
176a3('bum): tsam du zad do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//de bzhin nyid
176a4('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/mo nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming
176a5('bum): tsam du zad do//gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chos nyid dmigs su med
176a6('bum): pa'i phyir/chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chos kyi gnas
176a7('bum): nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//chos skyon med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/chos skyon med pa nyid zhes bya ba
176b1('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/byang chub
176b2('bum): ces bya ba 'dri ni ming tsam du zad do//sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/tshe dang ldan
176b3('bum): pashA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg po chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
176b4('bum): phrag brgya pa//bam po drug cu pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi
176b5('bum): bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang /rim
176b6('bum): gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa'i phyir//
176b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to//de
177a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/sems
177a2('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung
177a3('bum): ngo //de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing /lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to//
177a4('bum): de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas
177a5('bum): kyang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
177a6('bum): chen po dang /mi 'am mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
177a7('bum): chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon
177b1('bum): tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di
177b2('bum): zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su
177b3('bum): sgrog pa mdzad do//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten
177b4('bum): gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams
177b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//nub phyogs
177b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
177b7('bum): tu/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
178a1('bum): ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//byang
178a2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge
178a3('bum): mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
178a4('bum): nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//byang shar gyi phyogs
178a5('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgra na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che
178a6('bum): ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
178a7('bum): pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//shar lho'i phyogs
178b1('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
178b2('bum): tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/
178b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
178b4('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams cho ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems
178b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad
178b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
178b7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a1('bum): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad
179a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
179a3('bum): dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
179a4('bum): pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos
179a5('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas
179a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na
179a7('bum): med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
179b1('bum): bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas/
179b2('bum): zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so//go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/bcom
179b3('bum): ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
179b4('bum): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
179b5('bum): go cha bgos/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/bsam gtan gyi
179b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/phyi stong pa nyid kyi go tshe bgos/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha
179b7('bum): bgos/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/'dus
180a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/dor ba med pa stong
180a2('bum): pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/mi dmigs
180a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/dran pa
180a4('bum): nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/dbang po'i go cha bgos/stobs kyi go cha bgos/byang chub kyi yan
180a5('bum): lag gi go cha bgos/lam gyi go cha bgos/'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/tshad med pa'i go cha bgos/gzugs med pa'i
180a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgros/rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
180a7('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
180b1('bum): kyi go cha bgos/mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/so so yang dag par rig pa'i gau cha bgos/snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha
180b2('bum): bgos/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang
180b3('bum): ste/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par
180b4('bum): 'gengs so//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
180b5('bum): bas rgyas par 'gengs so//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'grengs so//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
180b6('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo skyed snang pos rgyas par 'gengs so//lho nub kyi phyogs mchims kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang pos rgyas par 'grengs so//
180b7('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
181a1('bum): bas rgyas par 'gengs so//steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
181a2('bum): rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten
181a3('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaud+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//byang phyogs
181a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug
