248b7('bum): par rjes su mthong nas/rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i
249a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu mi 'byed/rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/'di ni mi g.yo
249a2('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /mnyam par bzhag pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste//
249a3('bum): 'di ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig
249a4('bum): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la
249a5('bum): gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
249a6('bum): na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa med par byed pa ste/'di ni zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mig yongs su dag
249a7('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /mig lnga yongs su dag par byed pa ste/'di ni migo yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
249b1('bum): de la shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/'di ni shes rab
249b2('bum): sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa
249b3('bum): bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /sems can
249b4('bum): rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba dang zla ba bzhin du gyur pa ste/'di ni zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge
249b5('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
249b6('bum): na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
249b7('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
250a1('bum): to//de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag
250a2('bum): par rjes su mi mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting
250a3('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /sems mi g.yo rnam par mi g.yo rnam par mi ldog/yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur/nyams su mi bde ba med la/de la sems zhes bya
250a4('bum): ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste/'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge
250a5('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing /thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
250a6('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la
250a7('bum): rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/'di ni rin chen mtha'
250b1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya med pa'i mthas/phyag
250b2('bum): rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i
250b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/'di ni chos thams cad mnyam
250b4('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad
250b5('bum): kyi dga' ba spong ba ste/'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
250b6('bum): chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la chos
250b7('bum): kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'phags shing yongs su rgyas pa ste//
251a1('bum): 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
251a2('bum): shing /yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi 'byung khungs su gyur pa ste/'di ni rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
251a3('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /'jig rten gyi rtsod pa dang /'khrug pa rnam pa sna tshogs spong ba ste/'di ni 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
251a4('bum): to//de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya
251a5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos
251a6('bum): thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
251a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid nges par 'thob pa ste/'di ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la dri ma med par spyod pa
251b1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang nan/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /spyod pa mtha' yas pa rnam par dag par bskyod pa ste/'di ni dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin smra
251b2('bum): de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam po nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/'di ni yi
251b3('bum): ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge
251b4('bum): gcig kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
251b5('bum): shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs pa chad par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
251b6('bum): gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
251b7('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmigs pa med pa ste/'di ni rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ming dang
252a1('bum): mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad kyi ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i mtha'
252a2('bum): rtogs par byed pa ste/'di ni ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing //
252a3('bum): bya ba thams cad kun spong ba ste/'di ni bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
252a4('bum): shing /nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par dmigs su med cing ba snyed la bltos pa tsam mo zhes rtog par 'jug pa ste/'di ni ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
252a5('bum): to//de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas dmigs pa med pa ste/'di ni gnas med
252a6('bum): par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/
252a7('bum): 'di ni rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa
252b1('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
252b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/'di ni g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
252b3('bum): zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/'di ni yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la yon tan thams
252b4('bum): cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/
252b5('bum): 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing //
252b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems mi 'jug pa ste/'di ni sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting
252b7('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin de dag la sems nges par gnas kyang /de'i mtshan nyid dmigs su med par rtogs pa ste/'di ni nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
253a1('bum): to//de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me
253a2('bum): tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
253a3('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
253a4('bum): te//de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste//
253a5('bum): 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ji ltar sgron ma gsal
253a6('bum): bas chos thams cad rab tu snang bar byed pa de lta bu ste/'di ni mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
253a7('bum): zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
253b1('bum): 'dzin to//de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/
253b2('bum): 'di ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams
253b3('bum): cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud mthong ba ste/'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
253b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting
253b5('bum): nge 'dzin to//de la gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
253b6('bum): 'di ni gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos gang yang
253b7('bum): gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na//
254a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni rnam
254a2('bum): pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad
254a3('bum): kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting //
254a4('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la spyod pa
254a5('bum): dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /snyoms par 'jug pa de las spyod pa dam pa rnams sna tshogs ston kyang gang la yang 'dzin pa med pa ste//
254a6('bum): 'di ni spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing
254a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du mi chud pa gang yang med pa ste/'di ni rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong
254b1('bum): du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda dang sgra la 'jug
254b2('bum): pa ste/'di ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa
254b3('bum): med cing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i rin chen rgyud dam pa sgrub pa ste/'di ni rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
254b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la'ang chags pa med pa ste/'di ni chos thams cad la chags pa
254b5('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la glog gi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed pas mun pa
254b6('bum): mun nag sel ba dang /gzhan yang yon tan mtha' yas pa brgya 'god pa ste/'di ni glog gi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba zhes
254b7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtha' yas pa spong ba ste/'di ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
255a1('bum): to//de la chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid snang bar byed pa ste/'di ni
255a2('bum): chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos rnams kyi chos dang gang zag la
255a3('bum): bdag med par gsal bar ston pa ste/'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
255a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul phyir mi ldog pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa dam pa bsgrub pa ste/'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub
255a5('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge dang
255a6('bum): bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la
255a7('bum): gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid kyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba
255b1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya
255b2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmigs pa
255b3('bum): med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/'di ni mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting
255b4('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa ste/'di ni ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam pa'i mchog
255b5('bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni
255b6('bum): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge
255b7('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya kun tu 'dzin pa ste/'di ni gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa
256a1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
256a2('bum): 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge
256a3('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad par rung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la
256a4('bum): gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i
256a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin to//de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams
256a6('bum): cad yang dag pa dang /log par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni yang dag pa dang /log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la
256a7('bum): 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang
256b1('bum): 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa
256b2('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mthun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal//
256b3('bum): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi
256b4('bum): dmigs pa ste/'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin
256b5('bum): thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
256b6('bum): gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni zla ba dri ma med
256b7('bum): par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems
257a1('bum): can gyi ros snang bar byed pa ste/'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rgyun chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas/
257a2('bum): shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni rgyun chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
257a3('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag gi tsha ba'i gdung bsil bar byed pa ste/
257a4('bum): 'di ni gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting
257a5('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
257a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyob pa ste/'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa
257a7('bum): nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs rtse gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni ting nge
257b1('bum): 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin
257b2('bum): thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la
257b3('bum): nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni
257b4('bum): nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
257b5('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni nyon mongs pa
257b6('bum): dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting
257b7('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la de bzhin
258a1('bum): nyid la gnas shing /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi
258a2('bum): ldog pa ste/'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de
258a3('bum): la gnas shing /mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po bskyed de/ji ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas mang po dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste/
258a4('bum): 'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /nyon mongs
258a5('bum): pa thams cad kyi tha ba ma lus par sreg pa ste/'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ye shes chen po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
258a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes
258a7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas
258b1('bum): su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo bya
258b2('bum): bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste/'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
258b3('bum): gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la
258b4('bum): ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnos shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs
258b5('bum): pa ste/'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting
258b6('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la kun tu rtog pa
258b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /sems can gyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste/'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting
259a1('bum): nge 'dzin to//de la nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin du sems can rnams la snyoms
259a2('bum): par phan 'dogs pa ste/'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
259a3('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /chos thams cad na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste/'di ni nam mkha' ltar
259a4('bum): chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
259a5('bum): la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u dgu pa'o///rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
259a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /sems
259a7('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang
259b1('bum): gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam
259b2('bum): par bsal cing /rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson
259b3('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa
259b4('bum): rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten
259b5('bum): gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs
259b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
259b7('bum): rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can
260a1('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /tshor ba dang ldan
260a2('bum): pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go//phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
260a3('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi
260a4('bum): rtog go/nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pa sa/'jig rten gyi chags
260a5('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/phyi'i sems la de mi dmigs pa'i
260a6('bum): tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam
260a7('bum): par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson
260b1('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa
260b2('bum): rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi
260b3('bum): chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go//phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
260b4('bum): chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /rnam par spyod kyang
260b5('bum): chos dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
260b6('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/
260b7('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
261a1('bum): dpa' chen po 'gron 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//nyal na/
261a2('bum): nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//de'i lus nyams bde ba dang nyams mi bde'ang rung ste/ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/de lta de ltar nges par rab tu shes te/rab 'byor de ltar
261a3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas
261a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nang gi lus la
261a5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de/de 'gro 'am 'ong yang shos bzhin du spyod pa yin/lha 'am rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin//
261a6('bum): bskum mam brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang /myangs
261a7('bum): pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/nyal ba dang gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/'gro ba dang 'ong ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/'greng
261b1('bum): ba dang 'dug pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/gnyid kyis log gam ma log na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/smra ba dang mi smra na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/nang du
261b2('bum): yang dag par 'jog pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
261b3('bum): nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi tshogs sems dang yid mi
261b4('bum): bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dran zhing dbugs
261b5('bum): nang du rgyu na'ang /dran zhing dbugs nong du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang /dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs
261b6('bum): nang du ring du rgyuna'ang /dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang /dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs
261b7('bum): nang du thung ngu rgyuna'ang /dbugs nang du thung du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na'ang /phyir dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/
262a1('bum): da dutu smran rgan tha ma na nga pa mas na pams tshun nu na/'ong ma du du/
262a2('bum): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//thung du bskor na thung du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab
262a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dran par dbugs nang du brgyus no'ang /dran par dbugs nang du porgyus so zhes bye bar rab tu shes so//dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na 'ang
262a4('bum): dran par dkrugs phyir ba rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs ring du nang du brgyas na'ang /dbugs ring du nang du brgyas so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs ring
262a5('bum): du hrI r+ya brgyas na'ong /dbugs ring du phyir brgyas so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dbugs zung ngu nang du bcus no nga/dbugs thung du nang du bzlas so zhes bya bar rab
262a6('bum): shes so//dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na'ang /dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
262a7('bum): chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nang gi lus la de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lto zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
262b1('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
262b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams
262b3('bum): kyi rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ba lang gi shen pa 'am/ba lang gi shen pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po
262b4('bum): thogs te/ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/de ltar so sor phye nas/'greng ngam 'dug ste/de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems
262b5('bum): dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang /lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes
262b6('bum): bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lto ba bzhin du rtog ste/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
262b7('bum): 'greng ngam 'dug ste/nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lto zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten
263a1('bum): gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes
263a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/skra dong klad pa man chad du/sen mo dang /spu dang pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna
263a3('bum): tshogs kyis gang bar yang dog pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/lus 'di la skra dang /spu dang /sen mo dang /pags pa dang /glog pa dang /sha dang chu ba dang /khrag
263a4('bum): dang /rus pa dang /rkang dang /snying dang /mkhal ma dang /mchin pa dang /glo ba dang /mtsher ba dang /long ka dang /rgyu ma dang /gnye ma dang /nang grol dang /gcin dang /
263a5('bum): phyi sa dang /mchi ma dang /rdul dang /tshil dang /snabs dang /ngar snabs dang /rnag dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan dang /chu ser dang /kha chu dang /dri ma dang /klad pa dang /klad rgyas
263a6('bum): dang /rdum dang /rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/chun pa'i skye snod til dang /yungs kar dang
263a7('bum): sran chung dang /bal sran dang /nas dang /gro dang /'bras dang /'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis phye ste/bltas na/'di ni til lo//'di ni
263b1('bum): yungs kar ro//'di ni sran chung ngo //'di ni bal sran no//'di ni nas so//'di ni gre'o//'di ni 'bras so//'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//rab
263b2('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/sgra dang spyi bo man chad sen mo dang /spu dang /pags pa yan chad du mi
263b3('bum): gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/lus 'di la skra dang /spu dang /sen mo dang /pags pa dang /glog pa dang /sha dang /chu ba dang /khrag
263b4('bum): dang /rus pa dang /rkang dang /snying dang /mkhal ma dang /mchin pa dang /glo ba dang /mtsher ba dang /long ka dang /rgyu ma dang /gnye ma dang /nang grol dang /gcin dang /phyi
263b5('bum): sa dang /mchi ma dang /rdul dang /tshil dang /snabs dang /ngar snabs dang /rnag dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan dang /chu ser dang /kha chu dang /dri ma dang /klad pa dang /klad
263b6('bum): rgyas dang /rdum dang /rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
263b7('bum): bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i
264a1('bum): tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam
264a2('bum): par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod na yod pa'i
264a3('bum): gzugs sna tshogs/dur khrod du bor ba/ro'i mal du bskal ba/shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am/shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am/
264a4('bum): shi nas zhig bzhi lon pa 'am/shrI nAs zhag lnga lon pa 'am/rnam par bam pa 'am/rnam par bsngos pa'am/rnam par rnags pa 'am/rnam par zos pa 'am/rnam
264a5('bum): par 'thor ba mthong na/de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can no//'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/chos nyid 'di las ma 'das
264a6('bum): pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi
264a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam
264b1('bum): par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro/shi nas
264b2('bum): phrag drug lon pa'am/shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am/bya rog gum/khwa 'am/'ol ba 'am/bya rgod dam/spyang kI 'am/we 'am khyi 'am/de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi
264b3('bum): rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i chos can/de lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/chos nyid de lta
264b4('bum): bu las ma 'das so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi
264b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
264b6('bum): cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos
264b7('bum): pa/mi gtsang bas rnags pa/srungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/lus 'di'ang tshul 'di lta bu'i chos can/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/'di
265a1('bum): lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
265a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags
265a3('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
265a4('bum): nam dur khrod kyi rus pa/keng rus sha ra ri dang /khrag ro ri chags pa/rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dong sbyor te/lus
265a5('bum): 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
265a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang
265a7('bum): ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
265b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag med pa/rgyus pa'i gzungs med pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe//
265b2('bum): de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar
265b3('bum): nye bar rtog go//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus
265b4('bum): kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab
265b5('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs med pa gyes pa dung gi mdog
265b6('bum): ltar gyur pa/sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/
265b7('bum): 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
266a1('bum): tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags
266a2('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
266a3('bum): nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba/rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor//
266a4('bum): brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/dbyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/tshigs pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du
266a5('bum): 'thor/mdzad pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/lus 'di'ang
266a6('bum): 'di lta bu'i chos can/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
266a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin
266b1('bum): dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
266b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe//
266b3('bum): da lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go//
266b4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
266b5('bum): brtson 'grus can shos bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
266b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rab rib snang ba/sngon por gyur pa thi ba'i mdog
266b7('bum): ltar gyur pa/zags pa brul ba si'i rdul dang 'gran 'gren du gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/'di lta bu'i
267a1('bum): rang bzhin can te/'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
267a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang
267a3('bum): ldan pas/'jog rten gyi tshogs sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
267a4('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi nang gi lus
267a5('bum): la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi
267a6('bum): bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
267a7('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi'i tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i
267b1('bum): rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi nang
267b2('bum): gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi
267b3('bum): bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan
267b4('bum): pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi'i sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson
267b5('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi nang gi sems la de mi
267b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par
267b7('bum): bsal cing rnam par spyod do//nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten
268a1('bum): gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can
268a2('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
268a3('bum): gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par
268a4('bum): spyod do//rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
268a5('bum): po ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/bzhi grang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sdig to
268a6('bum): mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/dA mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems kyi mthu bskyed do//yang
268a7('bum): dag par smon lam 'debs so//sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo//brtson 'grus
268b1('bum): rtsom mo//sems kyi mthu bskyed do//yang dag par smon lam 'debs so//dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed
268b2('bum): cing rtsol lo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems kyi mthu bskyed do//yang dag par smon lam 'dre bas so//dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /phyir zhing bsgom pa
268b3('bum): dang /nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems kyi mthu bskyed
268b4('bum): do//yang dag par smon lam 'debs te/rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
268b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
268b6('bum): pa'i tshe/mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam
268b7('bum): par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo//brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la
269a1('bum): gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo//sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
269a2('bum): dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo//dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i
269a3('bum): 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la granas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa
269a4('bum): bsgom ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269a5('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes
269a6('bum): rab kyi dbang po ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
269a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ting
269b1('bum): nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs te/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan
269b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/bdun gang zhe na/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rnam
269b3('bum): par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang
269b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag dang /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe
269b5('bum): na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/'dod
269b6('bum): chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang
269b7('bum): dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos rnam par 'byed pa
270a1('bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de
270a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
270a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam
270a4('bum): par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
270a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/
270a6('bum): 'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang
270a7('bum): zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa
270b1('bum): la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'grog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//de la ting
270b2('bum): 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byung
270b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub po/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa
270b4('bum): byed do//de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
270b5('bum): btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de
270b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
270b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/brgyad gang zhe na/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang
271a1('bum): dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa
271a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin to//de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag
271a3('bum): pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa
271a4('bum): byed do//de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i rtog
271a5('bum): pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//
271a6('bum): yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i ngag dben pa la gnas
271a7('bum): pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//yang dag pa'i
271b1('bum): las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dben pa la gnas pa/'dod
271b2('bum): chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/rab
271b3('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/
271b4('bum): 'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
271b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/
271b6('bum): rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
271b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i dran pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/
272a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
272a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su
272a3('bum): grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
272a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
272a5('bum): dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/sems gnas pa stong pa nyid
272a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe/sems
272a7('bum): gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/chos thams cad mngon
272b1('bum): par 'du bya ba med do zhes mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe/sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo de
272b2('bum): dag la zhum pa med par dran par bya ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
272b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste/bcu gcig gang zhe na/sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog
272b4('bum): pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa dang /zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos shes pa dang /rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /kun rdzob shes pa dang /'dris pa
272b5('bum): shes pa dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o//de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o//de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/kun 'byung ba spang
272b6('bum): bar shes pa'o//de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o//de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes bya'o//
272b7('bum): de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par shes pa'o//de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o//de la
273a1('bum): chos shes pa gang zhe na/phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o//de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/mig mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa
273a2('bum): dang /rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /sna mi rtog ces bya bar shes pa dang /lce mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /lus mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /yid mi rtag
273a3('bum): ces bya bar shes pa dang /gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /sgra mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /dri mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /ro mi rtag ces bya bar
273a4('bum): shes pa dang /reg mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /chos mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /mig gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /gzugs kyi khams
273a5('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtog ces bya bar shes pa dang /rna ba'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /sgra'i khams
273a6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /sna'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /dri'i khams mi
273a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /lce'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /ro'i khams mi rtag
273b1('bum): ces bya bar shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /lus kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /reg bya'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar
273b2('bum): shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya b.ro shes pa dang /yid kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /chos kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes
273b3('bum): pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /sa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /chu'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /me'i
273b4('bum): khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams
273b5('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /ma rig pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
273b6('bum): ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /skye mo ched drug mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /rig pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa
273b7('bum): dang /sred pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /len pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /srid pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /skye ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
274a1('bum): rga shi mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o//de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o//de la
274a2('bum): 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/gang gis lam shes pa dang /yongs su byang ba shes pa'o//de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad
274a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
274a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang /
274a5('bum): yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang /yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o//de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/slob pa'i gang zag
274a6('bum): mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po yongs
274a7('bum): su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o//de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/gang zag slob pa yongs su
274b1('bum): shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste 'di ni yongs su
274b2('bum): shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o//de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/gang zag mi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
274b3('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/
274b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
274b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting
274b6('bum): nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting
274b7('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang
275a1('bum): bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/'di ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang
275a2('bum): bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/bsam gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/'di ni rtog pa
275a3('bum): med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa
275a4('bum): dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cung zad
275a5('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug
275a6('bum): pa'o//'di ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
275a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas rjes su
275b1('bum): dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes sgyu dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu
275b2('bum): ba rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub
275b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di lta ste/bsam gtan bzhi dang /
275b4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/de la bsam
275b5('bum): gtan bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/
275b6('bum): rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang //
275b7('bum): rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde
276a1('bum): ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la
276a2('bum): gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam
276a3('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med sdug
276a4('bum): bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'o///
276a5('bum): de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin
276a6('bum): tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
276a7('bum): kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa
276b1('bum): mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gzugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'
276b2('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad
276b3('bum): med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas
276b4('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med
276b5('bum): pa/gzugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i
276b6('bum): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do//de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi'o//de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
276b7('bum): gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
277a1('bum): 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas
277a2('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes
277a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med
277a4('bum): pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched los yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye
277a5('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o//de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di
277a6('bum): nirnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//bzang bar mos pa 'di ni
277a7('bum): rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du
277b1('bum): shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
277b2('bum): mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'o//
277b3('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las
277b4('bum): yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang
277b5('bum): dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do//de la mthar gyis
277b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'dod pas dben/sdig to/
277b7('bum): mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gton dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
278a1('bum): so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa/dpyod pa med pa//
278a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing
278a3('bum): shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod
278a4('bum): pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang
278a5('bum): nub pas/bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad
278a6('bum): du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas
278a7('bum): so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam
278b1('bum): par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
278b2('bum): te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes
278b3('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bskyobs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang
278b4('bum): tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
278b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag
278b7('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las dang /las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smin pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa dang /rgyu'i rnam
279a1('bum): par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs can te/'jig rten ni khams du ma'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
279a2('bum): rab tu shes so//sems can gzhan dang /gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sems can gzhan dang /
279a3('bum): gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang /tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dbang
279a4('bum): po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
279a5('bum): rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/tshe rabs
279a6('bum): brgya dang /tshe rabs stong dang /tshe rabs brgya stong dang /tshe rabs bye ba dang /tshe rabs bye ba brgya dang /tshe rabs bye ba stong dang /tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /tshe rabs bye
