279a7('bum): ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no//bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/bskal pa brgya dang /bskal pa stong dang /bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas/bskal
279b1('bum): babye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/ming ni 'di zhes bya'o//rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o//rus ni 'di zhes bya'o//zas na
279b2('bum): 'di za za'o//yun ni 'di srid gcig tu gnas gnas so//tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/de nas shi
279b3('bum): 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/sa mal dang bcas/gtan tshogs dang bcas par rnam pa du mas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no//lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi
279b4('bum): las 'das pas/sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //kha dog sdug pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa dang /bzang ba dang ngan pa dang /bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang /ngan
279b5('bum): song na 'khod pa dang /las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang
279b6('bum): ldan pa/yid kyis dran du spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/log par lta ba dag ste/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can
279b7('bum): dmyal bar skye'o//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags
280a1('bum): pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/yang dag par lta ba dag ste/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//zag
280a2('bum): pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa/rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon du byas te/nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par
280a3('bum): spyod do//bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do//bya ba ni byas so//rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni med do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/rab 'byor de'ang de mi
280a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni//
280a5('bum): 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes
280a6('bum): bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud ngam/tshangs pa 'am/gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang /
280a7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/
280b1('bum): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/
280b2('bum): gzhan su'ang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma
280b3('bum): gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
280b4('bum): rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod
280b5('bum): de/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/
280b6('bum): tshangs pa 'am/gzhan su'ang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//gang yang bdag gos bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na//
280b7('bum): bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten
281a1('bum): na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /
281a2('bum): bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo
281a3('bum): 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/gzhan su'ang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
281a4('bum): bya'o//gang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/sdug bsngal yang
281a5('bum): dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gzhan su'ang
281a6('bum): rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/de la bdag bde ba thob
281a7('bum): pa dang /bag tsho ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/tshangs
281b1('bum): pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/gzhan su'ang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
281b2('bum): bya'o zhes bya ba ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
281b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig
281b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
281b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/bco brgyad gang zhe na/gang gis nam la de bzhin
281b6('bum): gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang /gang gis nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas
281b7('bum): pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya
282a1('bum): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o//ca co mi mnga'o//dgongs pa
282a2('bum): nyams pa mi mnga'o//'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o//thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o//ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o//mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//
282a3('bum): brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//
282a4('bum): rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes mngon du 'gro ba ste/
282a5('bum): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon
282a6('bum): du 'gro ba ste/ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //'das pa'i dus la ma thogs mi chags pa'i yo shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye
282a7('bum): shes gzigs pa 'jug go//da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems
282b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te yi grwa
282b2('bum): mnyam pa nyid dang /brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang /yi ge'i sgro dang /yi go la 'jug pa ste/de la yi ge'i sgo dang /yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na/a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir
282b3('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//rA zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tse zhes bya ba ni 'a
282b4('bum): 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma sbyor ba'i phyir
282b5('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing dang rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dA zhes bya ba ni
282b6('bum): dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//Da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma
282b7('bum): dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas chags par mi 'gyur/'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//
283a1('bum): zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams
283a2('bum): cad kyi sgo'o//ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos
283a3('bum): thams cad kyi sgo'o//ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du mi dmigs pas mnyam pa nyid las mi
283a4('bum): 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir
283a5('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//shr-I zhes
283a6('bum): bya ba ni dbugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sha zhes bya ba ni zhi
283a7('bum): gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//k+Sha zhes bya ba ni
283b1('bum): zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sta zhes bya ba ni sdod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos
283b2('bum): thams cad kyi sgo'o//rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//b+ha zhes bya ba
283b3('bum): ni'ajigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
283b4('bum): cad kyi sgo'o//hA zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//g+ha zhes bya ba ni
283b5('bum): stug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tha zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//mo zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pas gang yang
283b6('bum): 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med de/gnas med cing 'dus pa med pa la nyal bar 'gyur ba med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//phya zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu
283b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ska zhes bya ba ni phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//yas zhes bya ba ni mi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i
284a1('bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
284a2('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba mi dmigs pas mtha' thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/de yan chad
284a3('bum): yi ge'i tha snyad med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang la'ang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang /gang gis brjod pa dang /gang gis bstan pa dang /gang gis bri
284a4('bum): ba dang /gang snang ba dang /gang klag par bya ba de lta bu'i ming gang yang med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ste/
284a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa a la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis a la sogs
284a6('bum): pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/de ni sgra gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur te/thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes
284a7('bum): par bya ba la mkhas pa thobo par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang /a la sogs pa'i yi ge la
284b1('bum): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed cing gzhan la'ang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos stan na/de la
284b2('bum): legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o//nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa dang ldan/blo gros dang ldan/rtogs pa dang ldan/blo dang ldan/dga' ba dang ldan/
284b3('bum): shes pa dang ldan/spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gzungs kyi sgro 'di'ang nyon mongs pa med par thob cing the tshom med par 'gyur la/gzhan las ngag snyan pa zos kyang
284b4('bum): chags par 'gyur ba med cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur bas/mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /sgra la
284b5('bum): mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /bden pa la mkhas par
284b6('bum): 'gyur ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas te/rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /dbang po rab
284b7('bum): dang tha ma shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
285a1('bum): rol gyi sems shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi/
285a2('bum): rnam par shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba la
285a3('bum): mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la
285a4('bum): mkhas pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285a5('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//
285a6('bum): bam po re lnga pa//rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/rab
285a7('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar te/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285b1('bum): po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas/chos gang yang 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med de/'pho ba 'am
285b2('bum): nye bar 'pho ba med do//'on kyang chos thams cad kyi sa gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa 'am/sems pa med des yongs su sbyong ba'ang mi byed pa ma yin la/sa de'ang yang
285b3('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
285b4('bum): dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/bcu gang zhe na/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i
285b5('bum): phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /sbyin pa dang /gtong ba dang /len
285b6('bum): pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /des rlom sems su mi bya ba'i phyir/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos thams cad mi dmigs
285b7('bum): pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs
286a1('bum): pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos kyi
286a2('bum): yang dag pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/rab 'byor
286a3('bum): yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag go/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
286a4('bum): dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang du yid la bya ste/de la nan tan du bya'o//brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul khrims yongs
286a5('bum): su dag pa dang /byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang /bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang /rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su
286a6('bum): mi btang ba dang /snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing rtsom pa ste/rab 'byor chos
286a7('bum): brgyad po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan du bya ba dag go/rab 'byor gzhan
286b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing de la'ang yi ge la//
286b2('bum): mngon par ma zhen pa dang /zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
286b3('bum): bskyed cing /yongs su sngo'ang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med cing /des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /ngo tsha/
286b4('bum): shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsum pa la gnas
286b5('bum): pas gnas par bya ba dag go/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blangs shing gnas par
286b6('bum): bya ste/de dag yongs su btang bar mi bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dgon pa la gnas pa dang /'dod pa chung ba dang /chog shes pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom//
286b7('bum): pa mi btang ba dang /bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba dang /'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /rdzas thams cad
287a1('bum): yongs su btang ba dang /sems zhum pa med pa dang /dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa ste/rab 'byor chos bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
287a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas yongs su btang bar mi bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
287a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/drug gang zhe na/'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /
287a4('bum): dge slong ma dang bsten pa dang /rigs la ser sna byed pa dang /'du 'dzi'i gnas dang /gnod sems dang /bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa ste/chos drug po de dag ni
287a5('bum): yongs su spang bar bya'o//yang chos bco brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/'di ltar mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o//lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /
287a6('bum): khengs pa dang /phyin ci log rnams dang /the tshom dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug nyam rangs su 'dor ba ste/chos bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub
287a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas chos
287b1('bum): drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/drug gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//rang
287b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//slong mo pa mthong na zhum pa med par bya ste/zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//dngos po
287b3('bum): thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya ste/yid mi bde ba yongs su spang bar bya'o//slong mo pa mthong na slong mo pas 'khrug par mi bya ste/'khrug pa'i sems yongs su
287b4('bum): spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
287b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya ste/nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o//sems can du 'dzin par mi bya'o//srog tu 'dzin par
287b6('bum): mi bya'o//gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o//chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o//rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o//mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o//rgyur lta ba dang /ming dang gzugs la mngon
287b7('bum): par chags pa dang /phung po la mngon par chags pa dang /khams la mngon par chags pa dang /skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang /khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang //
288a1('bum): khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /khams gsum la brten pa dang /khams gsum la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas la brton pa'i lta ba la mngon par/
288a2('bum): chags pa dang /chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon
288a3('bum): par chags pa dang /chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang /stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni bya ba ma yin pa'o//des chos nyi shu po 'di
288a4('bum): ngag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/nyi shu gang zhe na/stong pa nyid rdzogs par bya ba dang /mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba dang /smon pa med pa shes par bya ba dang /'khor gsum
288a5('bum): yongs su dag pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang /sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang /yang
288a6('bum): dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing /des rlom sems su mi bya ba dang /mi skye ba la bzod pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstun pa dang /rtog
288a7('bum): pa yang dag par bsal ba dang /lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang /nyon mongs po rnam par bzlog pa dang /zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong gi sa dang /dul ba'i sems dang /zhi ba'i
288b1('bum): sems dang /thogs pa med pa dang /byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang /gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste/rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
288b2('bum): bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su
288b3('bum): rdzogs par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba dang /mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta zhing /
288b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/rab 'byor bzhi po de
288b5('bum): dag ni yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i chos so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bzhi
288b6('bum): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba dang
288b7('bum): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/rab 'byor chos bzhi
289a1('bum): po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
289a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di ltar smon lom mtha' yas pa yongs su gzung
289a3('bum): ba ste/ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi
289a4('bum): 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang /yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes pa dang /ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /rigs
289a5('bum): phun sum tshogs pa dang /rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang /rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /mngon par 'byung
289a6('bum): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang /yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis
289a7('bum): po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o//rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
289b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
289b2('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub
289b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pos/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang dag par sdud pa 'di ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems
289b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid
289b5('bum): yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/tshad med pa bzhi ste/byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang btang snyoms mngon
289b6('bum): par bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b7('bum): po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong
290a1('bum): ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bston po yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang de la
290a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang /gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
290a3('bum): bshes gnyen te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag bsten pa dang /rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang bla ma la pu dud du bya ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
290a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rnam pa
290a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos 'chol zhing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290a6('bum): chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi
290a7('bum): med par 'byung zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung yang de la bar chad byed pa gang yang med pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang
290b1('bum): yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/nam rnam
290b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur gyi bar du/sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs
290b3('bum): rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290b4('bum): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston cing /thog mar yang dge ba/bar du'ang dge ba/tha mar
290b5('bum): yang dge ba/yi ge bzang po/don bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad
290b6('bum): pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i ribs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /rmad du byung
290b7('bum): ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyong
291a1('bum): ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang /khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/nga rgyal dang /khengs pa ji ltar bsal
291a2('bum): pab des/nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skye ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang /khongs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub
291a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
291a4('bum): chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o//rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su spyad pa bcu'o//de la byang
291a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing /de ma yin pa'i
291a6('bum): tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang /byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul
291a7('bum): khrims yongs su dag po'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
291b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na/mang po lta ci smos te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
291b2('bum): chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la gnod sems
291b3('bum): med cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab
291b4('bum): tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291b5('bum): po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/'di ltar sems can thams
291b6('bum): cad yongs su skyob pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291b7('bum): po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems
292a1('bum): can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi
292a2('bum): bar du/de dag tu gtub cing gshag pa dang /brdung zhing btso ba dang /bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi
292a3('bum): don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma
292a4('bum): bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma
292a5('bum): bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/las
292a6('bum): gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'tshol ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
292a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/
292b1('bum): 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad
292b2('bum): yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292b3('bum): chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu 'ang ra ba
292b4('bum): med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
292b5('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /bdag dang gzhan gyi
292b6('bum): sems kyi zhing yongs su spyod pa'i tshe/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge
292b7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
293a1('bum): gis nye bar brten na/sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar ston cing //
293a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs
293a3('bum): su skyo ba med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la
293a4('bum): smod pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas
293a5('bum): pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su
293a6('bum): mi btang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dod pa mi bskyed pa ste//
293a7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
293b1('bum): thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom
293b2('bum): pa mi btang ba gang zhe na/'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la mi rtog par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang
293b3('bum): ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
293b4('bum): chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyad pa gang zhe na/'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed pa ste/'di ni byang
293b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na//
293b6('bum): 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'dang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o//de la byang chub
293b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba gang zhe na/phyi nang gis chos thams cad 'dzin pa med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
294a1('bum): po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/rnam par shes pa gnas pa la de'i
294a2('bum): sems mi gnas pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad
294a3('bum): la bltos pa med pa gang zhe na/dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa'o//de la
294a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te
294a5('bum): skye ba dang /skra bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la byang chub
294a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing /de'i
294a7('bum): rgyus yongs su sgom pa'i sems mi bskyed cing /de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su
294b1('bum): spang bar bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
294b2('bum): ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gis bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/de
294b3('bum): la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub
294b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/nyan thos
294b5('bum): sam/rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur/byang chub sems dpa' sems
294b6('bum): dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
294b7('bum): pos gnod sems yongs su spong bar bya ba yin zhe na/gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing /'thab mo'i sems sam/rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/'di
295a1('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba
295a2('bum): gang zhe na/phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o//de la byang chub
295a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
295a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe
295a5('bum): na/de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na/'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lha la smos kyang mi dgos kyis spang
295a6('bum): bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
295a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i
295b1('bum): lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
295b2('bum): dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang
295b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang
295b4('bum): bar bya ba yin zhe na/dngos por mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang
295b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /
295b6('bum): gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o//de la sa drug la
295b7('bum): chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
296a1('bum): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/de ci'i phyir
296a2('bum): zhen/de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i gang chen
296a3('bum): mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to//phyin to//phyin par 'gyur ro//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /mi brjod pa dang /'dus ma
296a4('bum): byas te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
296a5('bum): drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam mo yin pas/nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/
296a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma
296a7('bum): yin pas/slong mo ba mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o//
296b1('bum): 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/thog ma sems bskyod nas/kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i sbyin pa yongs su btang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
296b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu
296b3('bum): med pa'i phyir ro//sems can du 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu med pa'i phyir ro//srog tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar srog shin tu med pa'i phyir ro///
296b4('bum): gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/
296b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi
296b6('bum): bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba med pa de la rtag pa dang /chad pa med pa'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su
296b7('bum): mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des lta ba
297a1('bum): de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/
297a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de
297a3('bum): ni 'di ltar phung po shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar na phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/khams la mngon
297a4('bum): pabapar chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
297a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/skye mched la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar na skye mched la mngon par chags par mi
297a6('bum): bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/de ltar na
297a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum
297b1('bum): la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen
297b2('bum): par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub
297b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par mi bya zhe na/de ni
297b4('bum): 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/khams gsum la gnas par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
297b5('bum): dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas/sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te//
297b6('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
297b7('bum): chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
298a1('bum): dpa' chen pos/chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/dge 'dun la brten pa'i
298a2('bum): lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas/dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
298a3('bum): dpa' chen pos/dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba
298a4('bum): la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas/tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
298a5('bum): chen pos/tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi
298a6('bum): bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/stong pa nyid
298a7('bum): la zhum par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas/stong pa
298b1('bum): nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
298b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa
298b3('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed
298b4('bum): pa'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa'o//de la ji
298b5('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de la ji ltar na
298b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o//de la ji
298b7('bum): lhor na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems
299a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang dbri ba med pa'o//de la byang chub
299a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang yin zhe na/chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems
299a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang yin zhe na/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa'o//de la byang
299a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ming dong gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba
299a5('bum): shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/'di ni byang chub
299a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang yin zhe na/
299a7('bum): chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas
299b1('bum): kyis rnam par spong ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad
299b2('bum): pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so//de la byang chub
299b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na/khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi
299b4('bum): ba'i sems gang zhe na/dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas
299b5('bum): kyi spyan thob pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/skye mched drug gi btang snyoms so//de la byang chub sems dpa'
299b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
299b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o//de la byang chub
300a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba gang zhe na/mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par brtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
300a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro'ang /de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta
300a3('bum): ba gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o//de la byang chub
300a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang
300a5('bum): phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing /des rlom sems su mi byed pa'o//de la byang chub
300a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba'o//de la byang chub
300a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o//de la
300b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang /tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/stobs bcu la gnas shing /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes
300b2('bum): pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su
300b3('bum): sbyong ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba
300b4('bum): thams cad byed pa ste/de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa gang zhe na/byang chub
300b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
300b6('bum): ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de
300b7('bum): lta de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/
301a1('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par
301a2('bum): 'gyur ba yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par
301a3('bum): 'gyur ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /
301a4('bum): lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
301a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/spobs pa so so yang dag por rig pas khong du
301a6('bum): chud pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/tshe
301a7('bum): rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
301b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
301b2('bum): rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing
301b3('bum): mtho ba 'am/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
301b4('bum): chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/
301b5('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub
301b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
301b7('bum): chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma
302a1('bum): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun
302a2('bum): sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu
302a3('bum): 'byung ba'i phyir/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang thog pa gsum la nges par 'gyur ba ste/'di ni byang
302a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs
302a5('bum): pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/lhun bai DUr+yar 'dug pa yin/yal ga rin po che bdun gyi
302a6('bum): rang bzhin las grub pa yin/me tog dang /lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/shing de'i dri zhim po dang /'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas
302a7('bum): par gang ba yin te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon
302b1('bum): tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
302b2('bum): par dag pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
302b3('bum): bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /
302b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
302b5('bum): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par
302b6('bum): gyur pa dag ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa'
302b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims
303a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
303a2('bum): pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid
303a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa
303a4('bum): dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
303a5('bum): spyod pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
303a6('bum): la spyod pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /yang dag par spong
303a7('bum): ba rnams la spyod pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /dbang po rnams la spyod po dang /stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod
303b1('bum): ba dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
303b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar
303b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
303b4('bum): la spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /
303b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/rigs kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/brgyad pa'i sa los yang
303b6('bum): dag par 'da'/mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa
303b7('bum): las yang dag par 'da'/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
304a1('bum): chen po de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas te/rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o//
304a2('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304a3('bum): stong phrag brgya pa//bam po re drug pa//rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum
304a4('bum): nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
304a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par
304a6('bum): mtshon nyid gcig pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung ba 'am/'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/byung bar gyur pa med de/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
304a7('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod po de ni de bzhin nyid
304b1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
304b2('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung
304b3('bum): bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
304b4('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rab tu byung ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'dod
304b5('bum): chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab
304b6('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
304b7('bum): ni/tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'du shes stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab
305a1('bum): 'byor grang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'du byed stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
305a2('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gang gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
305a3('bum): ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
305a4('bum): med do//'du shes stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//'du byed stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
305a5('bum): nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad
305a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//'du shes 'du shes kyis
305a7('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro//'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
305b1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab
305b2('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sna stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
305b3('bum): nino/lce stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lus stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
305b4('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung/
305b5('bum): ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rna ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
305b6('bum): med do//sna stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lce stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
305b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lus stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//yid stong
306a1('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro///
306a2('bum): rna ba rna bas stong pa'i phyir ro//sna snas stong pa'i phyir ro//lce lces stong pa'i phyir ro//lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang
306a3('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
306a4('bum): de ni/sgra stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dri stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
306a5('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ro stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni//
306a6('bum): reg stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir
306a7('bum): zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sgra stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
306b1('bum): 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dri stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
306b2('bum): ro stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//reg stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa
306b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i
306b4('bum): phyir zhe na/'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra sgras stong pa'i phyir ro//dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro//ro ros stong pa'i phyir ro//reg reg gis stong pa'i phyir ro//
306b5('bum): chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
306b6('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba'i rnam pa re shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
306b7('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lce'i
307a1('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lus kyi rnam par shes pa
307a2('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni//yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad
307a3('bum): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
307a4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni
307a5('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam
307a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
307a7('bum): med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/
307b1('bum): 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i/
307b2('bum): rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//
307b3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa
307b4('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
307b5('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
307b6('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
307b7('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
308a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
308a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
308a3('bum): nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
308a4('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te/
308a5('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa
308a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//lce'i
308a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg
308b1('bum): pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
308b2('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
308b3('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/
308b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
308b5('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
308b6('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
308b7('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
309a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lce'i 'dus te
309a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
309a3('bum): ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams
309a4('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig
309a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//sna'i 'dus te reg
309a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen byas tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//
309a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
309b1('bum): tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rmi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
309b2('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sgyu ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/smig rgyu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab
309b3('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sgra brnyan 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni//
309b4('bum): mig yor 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir
309b5('bum): zhe na/rab 'byor rmi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sgyu ma ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams
309b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//smig rgyu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sgra brnyan ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
309b7('bum): med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mig yor ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//de bzhin
