310a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rmi
310a2('bum): lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgyu ma ni sgyu mas stong pa'i phyir ro//smig rgyu ni smig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra brnyan ni sgra brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mig yor ni mig yor
310a3('bum): gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
310a4('bum): de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar
310a5('bum): 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
310a6('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni//
310a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar
310b1('bum): 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tshul
310b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams
310b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa
310b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
310b5('bum): med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
310b6('bum): ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol
310b7('bum): tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
311a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol
311a2('bum): tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan
311a3('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/phyi stong pa
311a4('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
311a5('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor glang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/chen po
311a6('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
311a7('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
311b1('bum): pa de ni/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod
311b2('bum): du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
311b3('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rang bzhin
311b4('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
311b5('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
311b6('bum): 'dod pa de ni/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar
311b7('bum): 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
312a1('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
312a2('bum): 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
312a3('bum): med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
312a4('bum): med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
312a5('bum): med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
312a6('bum): nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
312a7('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med
312b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa
312b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//chos thams
312b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do///
312b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dngos
312b5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa
312b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
312b7('bum): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid
313a1('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
313a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma
313a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa snying pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang
313a4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong
313a5('bum): pa'i phyir ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
313a6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
313a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
313b1('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/yang
313b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
313b3('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
313b4('bum): 'dod pa de ni/stobs rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bar 'dod du
313b5('bum): zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
313b6('bum): 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo
313b7('bum): bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do///
314a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
314a2('bum): du gnas pa med do//stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
314a3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
314a4('bum): nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye
314a5('bum): byabar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rdzu 'phrul
314a6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro///
314a7('bum): stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
314b1('bum): pa'i phyir ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
314b2('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/bsam gtan
314b3('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/tshad med pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
314b4('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
314b5('bum): 'dod pa de ni/rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
314b6('bum): pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
314b7('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mtshan ma med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/smon pa med pa 'byung
315a1('bum): bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
315a2('bum): gnas pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
315a3('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas
315a4('bum): 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad
315a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
315a6('bum): gnas pa med do//stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams
315a7('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad
315b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi nga ba nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//bsam/
315b2('bum): gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//gzugs med
315b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/rnam
315b4('bum): par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo
315b5('bum): pobo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
315b6('bum): smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smyon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung
315b7('bum): bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
316a1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kying bo nyid ni khams gsum nas
316a2('bum): 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
316a3('bum): pamed do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mngon
316a4('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sbyong ba'i phyir ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
316a5('bum): phyir ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin
316a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab
316a7('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
316b1('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
316b2('bum): ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
316b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo
316b4('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni/de
316b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/
316b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang
316b7('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rang
317a1('bum): sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang
317a2('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
317a3('bum): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
317a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//de bzhin
317a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i
317a6('bum): phyir zhe na/'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
317a7('bum): phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni/byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
317b1('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
317b2('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/phyir
317b3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dgra bcom pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
317b4('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/lam
317b5('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'dod du
317b6('bum): zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lan cig/
317b7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
318a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
318a2('bum): med do//rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
318a3('bum): ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
318a4('bum): gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//lan cig/
318a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo
318a6('bum): bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid
318a7('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo
318b1('bum): nyid ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sbyong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
318b2('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/brda 'byung bar
318b3('bum): 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
318b4('bum): pade ni/gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
318b5('bum): mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams
318b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//gangags pa stong pa nyid ni khams
318b7('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
319a1('bum): phyir ro//mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//badz+ra stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tha snyad/
319a2('bum): stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor grang mtshan nyid med
319a3('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'gag pa med pa
319a4('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang
319a5('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni//rnam par byang ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
319a6('bum): pa de ni/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad
319a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//kun nas nyon
319b1('bum): mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med
319b2('bum): do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
319b3('bum): med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar skye ba med pa ni/skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'gag pa med pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
319b4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam par byang ba med pa ni/rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
319b5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs 'dis na/'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas
319b6('bum): byung nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste/gnas pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po
319b7('bum): de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/theg pa chen po de gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir
320a1('bum): mi gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi
320a2('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa'ang
320a3('bum): ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/yang dag pa'i
320a4('bum): mtha' ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
320a5('bum): na/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang
320a6('bum): ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med
320a7('bum): do//yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de
320b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//yang dag
320b2('bum): pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
320b3('bum): dper na/nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor
320b4('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa 'ong ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
320b5('bum): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rab tu byang ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas
320b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin
320b7('bum): du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
321a1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa
321a2('bum): 'am mi gnas pa med do//'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//rab tu byung ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas
321a3('bum): pa med do//'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//'gog pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do///
321a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i
321a5('bum): dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab tu byung ba'i dbyings rab tu byung ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags
321a6('bum): dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro////shes rab kyi
321a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba//bam pa bdun pa//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper no//gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
321b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma
321b2('bum): yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'du shes stong pa nyid ni gnas pa 'dra ma yin mi
321b3('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'du byed stong pa nyid ni gnas
321b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rnam par
321b5('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
321b6('bum): rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi
321b7('bum): gnas pa med do//'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
322a1('bum): 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'du byed 'du
322a2('bum): byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
322a3('bum): po'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rna ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang
322a4('bum): ma yin mi gnas pa'ang mo yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sna stong
322a5('bum): pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ango ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
322a6('bum): dper na/lce stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
322a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/lus stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
322b1('bum): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/yid stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi
322b2('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//rna ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//sna'i ngo bo nyid la ni
322b3('bum): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//lce'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//lus kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//yid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
322b4('bum): pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba rna bas stong pa'i phyir ro//sna snas stong pa'i phyir ro//lce lces stong
322b5('bum): pa'i phyir ro//lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang
322b6('bum): ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgra stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin
322b7('bum): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dri stong pa nyid ni gnas
323a1('bum): pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
323a2('bum): dper na/ro stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//

323a4('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/chos stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang
323a5('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//sgra'i ngo bo nyid la ni
323a6('bum): granas pa 'am mi granas pa med do//dri'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//ro'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//reg gi ngo bo nyid la/
323a7('bum): ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//chos kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis
323b1('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra sgras stong pa'i phyir ro//dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro//ro ros sbyong ba'i phyir ro//reg reg gis stong pa'i phyir ro//chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'ang/
323b2('bum): lta ste dper na/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
323b3('bum): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po
323b4('bum): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//

323b7('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mo gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di
324a1('bum): lta ste dper na/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang

324a4('bum): pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi
324a5('bum): gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam
324a6('bum): par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//

324b1('bum): dper na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang

327a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rmi lam rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgyu ma sgyu mas stong pa'i phyir ro//smig rgyu smig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra brnyan sgra
327a5('bum): brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mig yor mig yor gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//gzugs brnyan gzugs brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshugs pa'i sprul pa de bzhin
327a6('bum): gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin

327b1('bum): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas

327b6('bum): chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//
