366a1('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor ro de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
366a2('bum): ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor
366a3('bum): gal te reg de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
366a4('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor
366a5('bum): reg de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir
366a6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te chos de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan
366a7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg
366b1('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chos de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/
366b2('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du
366b3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin
366b4('bum): ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
366b5('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs
366b6('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
366b7('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin
367a1('bum): la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
367a2('bum): mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed
367a3('bum): pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha
367a4('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te//
367a5('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
367a6('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed
367a7('bum): pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
367b1('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log
367b2('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
367b3('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa
367b4('bum): ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du btsos pa'i 'jig rteni zil gyis
367b5('bum): mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/
367b6('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan lnga ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
367b7('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi
368a1('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
368a2('bum): mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag
368a3('bum): pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
368a4('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan
368a5('bum): la ther zug ma yin 'gyur pa'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba
368a6('bum): yin no//rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba
368a7('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
368b1('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug
368b2('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcos pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor
368b3('bum): gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci ldog ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan
368b4('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
368b5('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i
368b6('bum): chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sna'i
368b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
369a1('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lnga dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
369a2('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i
369a3('bum): chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te
369a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug
369a5('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur//
369a6('bum): te/rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te//
369a7('bum): dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lus kyi 'dus
369b1('bum): te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
369b2('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus
369b3('bum): te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bskyabs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg
369b4('bum): pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan
369b5('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen
369b6('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par
369b7('bum): bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
370a1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan
370a2('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa
370a3('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam
370a4('bum): par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
370a5('bum): lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de
370a6('bum): bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin
370a7('bum): na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
370b1('bum): ra ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/ljongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po'/
370b2('bum): lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jog rten zil gyis mnon te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/mo nor ba de bzhin/
370b3('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la bar zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg
370b4('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan ning 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam
370b5('bum): par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa tshan
370b6('bum): po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor
370b7('bum): ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig
371a1('bum): yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te/
371a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po
371a3('bum): med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
371a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
371a5('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te//
371a6('bum): rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
371a7('bum): ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor
371b1('bum): gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
371b2('bum): cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
371b3('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma
371b4('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor
371b5('bum): gal te sa'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther
371b6('bum): zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
371b7('bum): rab 'byor sa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas
372a1('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te chu'i khams de bzhin/ma
372a2('bum): nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
372a3('bum): po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chu'i khams de
372a4('bum): rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa
372a5('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te me'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan
372a6('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa skye/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg
372a7('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor me'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par
372b1('bum): bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
372b2('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rlung gi khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag
372b3('bum): pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
372b4('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rlung gi khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma
372b5('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal
372b6('bum): te nam mkha'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
372b7('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/zag pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor
373a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
373a2('bum): dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa'i
373a3('bum): khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
373a4('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
373a5('bum): rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
373a6('bum): te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yon du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te ma rig pa
373a7('bum): de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhino/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
373b1('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor ma rig pa de rnam
373b2('bum): par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
373b3('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
373b4('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang
373b5('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi
373b6('bum): rtartog cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te
373b7('bum): 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhi ni/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba
374a1('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
374a2('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la
374a3('bum): thezer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
374a4('bum): rab 'byor gal te ming dang gzugs de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan
374a5('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
374a6('bum): 'gyur te/rab 'byor ming dang gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
374a7('bum): dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te skye mched drug de
374b1('bum): bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin to/phyin ci log ma yin la bdon pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi
374b2('bum): dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor skye mched drug de
374b3('bum): rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
374b4('bum): po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa
374b5('bum): de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po
374b6('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/
374b7('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du
375a1('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log
375a2('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang //
375a3('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi
375a4('bum): rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
375a5('bum): te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sred pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du
375a6('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
375a7('bum): cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sred pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos
375b1('bum): can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te len pa de bzhin//
375b2('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
375b3('bum): zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor len pa de rnam par brtags
375b4('bum): pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /
375b5('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te skyid pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci
375b6('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi
375b7('bum): dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor srid pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/
376a1('bum): mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas dri'i phyir thog pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
376a2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te skye ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la
376a3('bum): bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zor zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang
376a4('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor skye ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/
376a5('bum): mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg po chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
376a6('bum): gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rga shi de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhi no/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/
376a7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
376b1('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor na shi de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin
376b2('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte ni zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no///
376b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bdun nu pa//rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg
376b4('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma
376b5('bum): yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
376b6('bum): pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
376b7('bum): 'gyur te/rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
377a1('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po
377a2('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma
377a3('bum): yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha
377a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
377a5('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
377a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg
377a7('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po
377b1('bum): med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te shes rab
377b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
377b3('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
377b4('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /
377b5('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi
377b6('bum): dang lha mi yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po
377b7('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir
378a1('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po
378a2('bum): yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab
378a3('bum): 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba
378a4('bum): yin no//rab 'byor gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
378a5('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi
378a6('bum): dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni
378a7('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po
378b1('bum): ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos
378b2('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab
378b3('bum): 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
378b4('bum): ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
378b5('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin
378b6('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen
378b7('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnani cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin
379a1('bum): pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mtha'
379a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
379a3('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin/
379a4('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma
379a5('bum): yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa
379a6('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no///
379a7('bum): rab 'byor gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas
379b1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /
379b2('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg
379b3('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po
379b4('bum): ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad stong
379b5('bum): pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
379b6('bum): mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
379b7('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha
380a1('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas//
380a2('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod
380a3('bum): pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab
380a4('bum): 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
380a5('bum): nga yin no//rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du
380a6('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
380a7('bum): dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma
380b1('bum): yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /me dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la
380b2('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te dngos po med
380b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
380b4('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du
380b5('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa
380b6('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po med la/dngos
380b7('bum): po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba
381a1('bum): rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan//
381a2('bum): cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas
381a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po
381a4('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po med la/dngos po ma
381a5('bum): yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te dbang po rnams dngos
381a6('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
381a7('bum): te/rab 'byor dbang po rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
381b1('bum): 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te stobs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
381b2('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor stobs rnams dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin
381b3('bum): dubacas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa
381b4('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po med la/
381b5('bum): po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lce dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lam dngos po yod pa
381b6('bum): zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yon du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor
381b7('bum): lam dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal
382a1('bum): te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
382a2('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi
382a3('bum): dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni//
382a4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams dngos po med la
382a5('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te tshad med
382a6('bum): pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
382a7('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
382b1('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis
382b2('bum): kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med la/
382b3('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa rnams
382b4('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin ni na/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
382b5('bum): te/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
382b6('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis
382b7('bum): kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po
383a1('bum): med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal//
383a2('bum): te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mau dang /
383a3('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dngos po med
383a4('bum): la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis munan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor kal
383a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/thog pa chen po 'dris kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
383a6('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
383a7('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis man ni cong 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg
383b1('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin/
383b2('bum): pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po yod
383b3('bum): pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis man ni cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab
383b4('bum): 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
383b5('bum): ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
383b6('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg
383b7('bum): pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig
384a1('bum): yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dris kyang lU dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
384a2('bum): rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
384a3('bum): 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha
384a4('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de phyir theg pa nan
384a5('bum): po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te snying rje chen po dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med
384a6('bum): pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor snying rje chen po dngos po med la
384a7('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi
384b1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
384b2('bum): cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du
384b3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dris
384b4('bum): kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te//rab 'byor rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir
384b5('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te
384b6('bum): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor brgyad pa'i
384b7('bum): sa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab
385a1('bum): 'byor gal te rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

385a4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po med la

385b1('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /

385b6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/thog pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis

386a6('bum): bapa yin no//rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

386b1('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rgyun du zhugs pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis

386b6('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
