448a6('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba'ang med//
448a7('bum): 'gro ba'ang med/gnas pa'ang med do//rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so//phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs so//
448b1('bum): dbus kyang mi dmigs te/'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/theg pa chen po zhes bya'o zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang
448b2('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/dbus kyang mi dmigs te/dus gsum mnyam po nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
448b3('bum): rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo //ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo //da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong
448b4('bum): ngo //dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo //theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos stong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong
448b5('bum): ste/rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do//gnyis zhes bya ba med do//gsum zhes bya ba med do//bzhi zhes bya ba med do//lnga zhes bya ba med do//drug ces bya ba med do//
448b6('bum): bdun zhes bya ba med do//brgyud ces bya ba med do//dgu zhes bya ba med do//bcu zhes bya ba med do//tha dad ces bya ba med do//de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
448b7('bum): po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/de la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//de la 'dod chags dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so//zhe sdang dang zhe sdang
449a1('bum): med pa'ang mi dmigs so//gti mug dang gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so//ming dang ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so//'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang mi
449a2('bum): dmigs so//dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so//kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so//zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'ang mi
449a3('bum): dmigs so//kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so//'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so//skye ba dang /
449a4('bum): 'gag pa'ang mi dmigs so//kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs so//de la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so//bde ba dang sdug bsngal
449a5('bum): ba'ang mi dmigs so//bdag dang bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so//zhi ba dang ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so//'dod pa'i khams dang 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da'
449a6('bum): ba'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams
449a7('bum): las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so//'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/rab
449b1('bum): 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs
449b2('bum): su med na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'das pa'i tshor ba ni 'das pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid
449b3('bum): la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab
449b4('bum): 'byor 'das pa'i 'du shes ni 'das pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong
449b5('bum): pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'das pa'i 'du byed ni 'das pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir
449b6('bum): zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur
449b7('bum): ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam por shes pa dmigs su
450a1('bum): med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor ma
450a2('bum): 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong
450a3('bum): pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba ni mi 'ongs pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //de
450a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dmigs
450a5('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmigs su
450a6('bum): med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i
450a7('bum): 'du byed ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su
450b1('bum): myemed na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //de ci'i
450b2('bum): phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam
450b3('bum): par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung
450b4('bum): ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smras/
450b5('bum): rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni da ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis
450b6('bum): stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis
450b7('bum): stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la da ltar
451a1('bum): byung ba'i 'du shes dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni de ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/
451a2('bum): stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed
451a3('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni de ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la da
451a4('bum): ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa
451a5('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/sbyin
451a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa
451a7('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang
451b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smros/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang
451b2('bum): zhig smos//rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
451b3('bum): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs//
451b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das
451b5('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
451b6('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus
451b7('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa
452a1('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta tsa zhig
452a2('bum): smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi
452a3('bum): dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
452a4('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam
452a5('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i
452a6('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/bsam gtan
452a7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa
452b1('bum): nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
452b2('bum): dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci
452b3('bum): zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i/
452b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe
452b5('bum): na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam
452b6('bum): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus
452b7('bum): dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/
453a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
453a2('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa
453a3('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/phyi stong
453a4('bum): pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam
453a5('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
453a6('bum): nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci
453a7('bum): zhig smos/rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/phyi nang
453b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs//
453b2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs
453b3('bum): papa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi
453b4('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
453b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
453b6('bum): nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci
453b7('bum): zhig smos/rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/chen po stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/chen po stong
454a1('bum): pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ni'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
454a2('bum): dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs
454a3('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi
454a4('bum): dmigs/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa
454a5('bum): nyid la mi dmigs te/dri ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la
454a6('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam po nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i
454a7('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa
454b1('bum): nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
454b2('bum): 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid
454b3('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i des dmigs pa lta ci zhige smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhige smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus
454b4('bum): dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong
454b5('bum): pa nyid ni de ltar byang bar mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
454b6('bum): dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi
454b7('bum): dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig
455a1('bum): smos/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/mtha' las 'das pa
455a2('bum): stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
455a3('bum): dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid lta da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na
455a4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor
455a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung
455a6('bum): bar mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs//
455a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la
455b1('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon
455b2('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs/dor bu med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam
455b3('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
455b4('bum): ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci
455b5('bum): zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigs
455b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
455b7('bum): mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam
456a1('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor
456a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs//
456a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
456a4('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs
456a5('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi
456a6('bum): mthar mi dmigs/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
456a7('bum): nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi
456b1('bum): dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos//
456b2('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa
456b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i
456b4('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/
456b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i
456b6('bum): dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong
456b7('bum): pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
457a1('bum): dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
457a2('bum): mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci
457a3('bum): zhig smos/rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs
457a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
457a5('bum): pa'i dus ma dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
457a6('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
457a7('bum): stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs//
457b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/de ci'i phyir zhen/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
457b2('bum): bu'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyamo pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs ni/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lha ci
457b3('bum): zhig spros/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lha ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
457b4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
457b5('bum): mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
457b6('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
457b7('bum): sprosmos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
458a1('bum): dmigs/yang drag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
458a2('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid
458a3('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs
458a4('bum): pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
458a5('bum): ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs//
458a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la
458a7('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor dbang po rnams ni
458b1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de
458b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam
458b3('bum): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus
458b4('bum): dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs//
458b5('bum): stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi
458b6('bum): dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs to/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
458b7('bum): smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs//
459a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum
459a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid
459a3('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i
459a4('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/'phags
459a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi me'i mthar mi dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus
459a6('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid
459a7('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i
459b1('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden
459b2('bum): pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs
459b3('bum): te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi
459b4('bum): dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da
459b5('bum): ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/bas mi gtan
459b6('bum): rnams ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
459b7('bum): dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/
460a1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos//
460a2('bum): rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/tshad med pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/tshad med pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/tshad med pa rnams ni dus
460a3('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid
460a4('bum): lA dra ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lha ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus
460a5('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/de ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/gzugs/
460a6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/gzugs med pa'i snyoms
460a7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
460b1('bum): dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
460b2('bum): smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/rnam par
460b3('bum): thar pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe
460b4('bum): na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa
460b5('bum): nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs
460b6('bum): pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar
460b7('bum): mi dmigs/mthir gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
461a1('bum): dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/mnyam pa nyid la dA lta
461a2('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lha ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs
461a3('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mthar
461a4('bum): mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
461a5('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
461a6('bum): dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
461a7('bum): dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa
461b1('bum): lha ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar ma
461b2('bum): dmigs/mngon par shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmyigs/mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam
461b3('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
461b4('bum): la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig
461b5('bum): smos/rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ting nge 'dzin rnams na de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ting nge
461b6('bum): 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi
461b7('bum): dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
462a1('bum): smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mthar
462a2('bum): mi dmigs/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
462a3('bum): la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar
462a4('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs
462a5('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
462a6('bum): stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
462a7('bum): mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
462b1('bum): ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
462b2('bum): smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/mi 'jigs
462b3('bum): pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/
462b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das
462b5('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
462b6('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/so so yang dag par rig
462b7('bum): pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
463a1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
463a2('bum): smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/byams pa chen po
463a3('bum): ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/byams pa chen po ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/byams pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam
463a4('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
463a5('bum): nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci
463a6('bum): zhig smos/rab 'byor snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/snying rje chen po ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/snying rje chen po ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/snying rje chen po ni dus
463a7('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid
463b1('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa
463b2('bum): lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
463b3('bum): bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
463b4('bum): la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
463b5('bum): dus kyang mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
463b6('bum): smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/so so'i skye
463b7('bum): bo ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang
464a1('bum): nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/nyan thos ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
464a2('bum): dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
464a3('bum): dmigs/rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dmigs su med pa'i
464a4('bum): phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung
464a5('bum): bar mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang de
464a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/de bzhin
464a7('bum): gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
464b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
464b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
464b3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom
464b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di/legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/
464b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo//bcom ldan 'das ma
464b6('bum): 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//bcom
464b7('bum): ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mchis kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la
465a1('bum): dasu stsa shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'drim byang chub sems
465a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de
465a3('bum): bzhin no//de de bzhin te/theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
465a4('bum): rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to//brnyes so brnyes par 'gyur ro///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
465a5('bum): pa//bam po don bzhi pa//de nas byams gang gi bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/de bzhin gshegs
465a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas/'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so//de nas
465a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gam/gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /'gal bar
465b1('bum): theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa'ang med de/rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun
465b2('bum): par theg pa chen po ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos
465b3('bum): sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos
465b4('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa/de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos
465b5('bum): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
465b6('bum): pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi
465b7('bum): dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa
466a1('bum): drug dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
466a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid
466a3('bum): dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor
466a4('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong
466a5('bum): pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /
466a6('bum): stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par
466a7('bum): shes pa dang /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /rgyas pa'i skye mched dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa
466b1('bum): dang /lam dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
466b2('bum): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /sangs
466b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang /shes rab
466b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dong ba ste/nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos so///
466b5('bum): rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
466b6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs gang
466b7('bum): yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /'du shes gang yin pa dang /'du byed gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /mig gang yin pa dang /gzugs gang yin pa
467a1('bum): dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /rna ba gang yin
467a2('bum): pa dang /sgra gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /sna
467a3('bum): gang yin pa dang /dri gang yin pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
467a4('bum): lce gang yin pa dang /ro gang yin pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te rog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin
467a5('bum): pa dang /lus gang yin pa dang /reg gang yin pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

467a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /me'i khams gang yin pa dang /rlung gi khams gang
467b1('bum): yin pa dang /nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams glang yin pa dang /ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang //
467b2('bum): ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang /skye mched drug gang yin pa dang /reg pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /sred pa gang yin pa dang /len pa gang yin pa dang /skyid pa gang
467b3('bum): yin pa dang /skye ba gang yin pa dang /rga shi gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

467b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /don dam pa
467b6('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma
467b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan
468a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang //
468a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
468a3('bum): gang yin pa dang /dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang /stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

468a7('bum): pa dang /'gog pa gang yin pa dang /lam gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin/

468b5('bum): kyi chos gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /'dul ba gang yin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings gang yin
468b6('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos
468b7('bum): de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/
469a1('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis na/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dag pa chen do'ang gzhan la/shes/
469a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gan ni zhes bya ba med de/de lhor na theg pa chen po dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis smra med de gnyis su byung med do//theg pa chen po
469a3('bum): rganan la/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byu
469a4('bum): med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis

469a6('bum): pa'ang gnyis su mang de gnyis su byur med do//thegs pa chen po'ang gzhan la/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /tshul
469a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byer med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na cig
469b1('bum): pa chen po dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
469b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med do gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyang

470a2('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gauzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /mtha' las 'das/
470a3('bum): bab stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po
470a4('bum): dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de
470a5('bum): ltar na theg pa chen po dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de//

470b6('bum): chen po'ang gzhan la/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar

471a1('bum): gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /rdzu 'phrul/

471a7('bum): rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan
471b1('bum): la/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byur med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan

471b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de
471b4('bum): gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gnyis su
471b5('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /mthar
471b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
471b7('bum): dang /smon pa med pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang gnyis su med
472a1('bum): de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /mngon par shes pa rnams
472a2('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams
472a3('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /gzungs kyi sgo
472a4('bum): rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po
472a5('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de
472a6('bum): ltar na theg pa chen po dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya
472a7('bum): ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/snying rje chen po'ang
472b1('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
472b2('bum): pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rab 'byor
472b3('bum): rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur
472b4('bum): ro/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyes bcom/ldan 'angang la 'di ste/da chos gsol to//becom ldan 'das 'di gyur yang bong chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi ma/thar mi dmigs
472b5('bum): so//byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/byang chub
472b6('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o//tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o//'du shes
472b7('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o//'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' kun
473a1('bum): tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o//rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/
473a2('bum): gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so//tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so//
473a3('bum): 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so//'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so//rnam
473a4('bum): par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams
473a5('bum): cad/rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing
473a6('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
473a7('bum): phyin pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas te/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi
473b1('bum): ba'ang /bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'ang /byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par
473b2('bum): grub pa ma mchis so//de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta'ang gang zhig mchis/gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lta'ang gang
473b3('bum): zhig mchis/gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta'ang gang zhig mchis/gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed lta'ang gang zhig mchis/gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes
473b4('bum): pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/gzugs ma lags/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags/gang mngon par ma grub
473b5('bum): pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das de lta
473b6('bum): lags la mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang /gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na/mngon par ma grub
473b7('bum): pa mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam/gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi
474a1('bum): 'dzum yongs su mi 'dzum/'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yid mi 'jigs mi dngang /skrag par mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
474a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/
474a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin/phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/tshe dang
474a4('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
474a5('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
474a6('bum): bya ba yin/'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
474a7('bum): chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi
474b1('bum): dmigs pa yin/tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/'du
474b2('bum): byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/tshe dang
474b3('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma
474b4('bum): dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad
474b5('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
474b6('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni
474b7('bum): ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang /bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
475a1('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi rang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so//de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma
475a2('bum): mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/gzugs mngon par grub pa lta'ang glang zhig mchis/tshor ba mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/'du shes mngon par grub pa lnga'ang gang
475a3('bum): zhig mchis/'du byed mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis te/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs
475a4('bum): ma lags so//gang mngon par ma grub pa don tshor rab ma lags so//gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes mu lugs so//gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed
475a5('bum): lags so//gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig/mngon par
475a6('bum): ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gangams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes ste/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las
475a7('bum): gung ni'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du gal te de ltar bstan
475b1('bum): pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum yongs su mi 'jum 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /yid mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/byang chub
475b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di
475b3('bum): skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sems can stong pa dang /sems can dben pa
475b4('bum): dang /sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
475b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sems can stong pa dang /sems can dben pa dang /sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar ma dmigs so///
475b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sems can stong pa dang /sems can dben pa dang /sems can rang
475b7('bum): bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can med pa dang /sems can stong pa dang /sems
476a1('bum): can dben pa dang /sems can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dbus su mi dmigs so//sems can med
476a2('bum): pa'ang gzhan/sems can stong pa'ang gzhan/sems can dben pa'ang gzhan/sems can rang bzhin med pa'ang gzhan zhig la/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/
476a3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni sems can med pa gang yin pa dang /
476a4('bum): sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang /sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang /sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon
476a5('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
476a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs
476a7('bum): dben pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
476b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs dben pa'i
476b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub
476b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
476b4('bum): su mi dmigs so//gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs med pa dang //
476b5('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid dang /gzugs dben pa dang /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/gzugs med pa'ang
476b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
476b7('bum): ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/gzugs med pa gang
477a1('bum): yin pa dang /gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
477a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan
477a3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor
477a4('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba med pa'i
477a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang
477a6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
477a7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
477b1('bum): dmigs so//tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa dang /tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /
477b2('bum): tshor ba dben pa dang /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'i ma dmigs//dbus mi dmigs te/tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshor ba stong pa
477b3('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
477b4('bum): ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin
477b5('bum): pa dang /tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
477b6('bum): gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
477b7('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
478a1('bum): mau dmigs so//'du shes ba nyi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthad+ma mi dmigs so//'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
478a2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mI'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' spyi
478a3('bum): momi'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
478a4('bum): mi dmigs so//'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
478a5('bum): 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes med pa dang /'du shes stong
478a6('bum): bo nyid dang /'du shes dpon pa dang /'du shes ngo bo nyid med pal sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/dbus mi dmigs te/'du shes med
478a7('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'du shes dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems
478b1('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du shes med pa
478b2('bum): gang yin pa dang /'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'du shes dben pa gang yin pa dang /'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
478b3('bum): dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
478b4('bum): bu 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed dben
478b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed med pa'i phyir byang
478b6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
478b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
479a1('bum): mi dmigs so//'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so//'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma
479a2('bum): dmigs so//'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang /'du
479a3('bum): byed stong pa nyid dang /'du byed dben pa dang /'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/'du byed med pa'ang
479a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo yin/'du byed dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
479a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi mo'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du
479a6('bum): byed med pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
479a7('bum): gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
479b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
479b2('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
479b3('bum): dmigs so//rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
479b4('bum): so//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
479b5('bum): so//rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam
479b6('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
479b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par shes pa med pa dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
480a1('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
480a2('bum): ma yin/rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ong gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang
480a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /rnam
480a4('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
480a5('bum): pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
480a6('bum): radwa ti'i bu/mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig
480a7('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig med pa'i phyir
480b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so//mag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
480b2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
480b3('bum): so//mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i
480b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu mig med pa dang /mig stong pa nyid dang /mig dben pa dang /mig ngo bo
480b5('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mig med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mig/
480b6('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha'
480b7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mig med pa gang yin pa dang /mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mig dben pa
481a1('bum): gang yin pa dang /mig ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
481a2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
481a3('bum): rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba ngo bo nyid med
481a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
481a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
481a6('bum): mi dmigs so//rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba dben pa'i
481a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
