481b1('bum): teti'i bu/rna ba med pa dang /rna ba stong pa nyid dang /rna ba dben pa dang /rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rnab med/
481b2('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rna ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//
481b3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bri/de ltar na rna ba med pa gang yin pa dang /rnab
481b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rna ba dpon pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi
481b5('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
481b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sde ngo
481b7('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
482a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so//sna ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
482a2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so//sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
482a3('bum): sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
482a4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sna med pa dang /sna stong pa nyid dang /sna dben pa dang /sna ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
482a5('bum): dmigs te/sna med pa'i nga gzhan ma yin/sna stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sna dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sna ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
482a6('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
482a7('bum): de ltar na sna med pa gang yin pa dang /sna stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sna dben pa gang yin pa dang /sna ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
482b1('bum): pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus grang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
482b2('bum): lce med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub
482b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar
482b4('bum): mi dmigs so//lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce ngo bo
482b5('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
482b6('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
482b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lho med pa dang /lce stong pa nyid dang /lce dben pa dang /lce ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
483a1('bum): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lce med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/lce dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce ngo bo nyid med pa'ang
483a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang
483a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce med pa gang yin pa dang /lce stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lce dben pa gang yin pa dang /lce ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub
483a4('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
483a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
483a6('bum): so//lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus
483a7('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus dben pa'i phyir
483b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
483b2('bum): su mi dmigs so//lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus ngo bo nyid
483b3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus med pa dang /lus stong pa nyid dang /lus dben pa dang /lus
483b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lus med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin//
483b5('bum): lus dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang
483b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu do ltar na lus med pa gang yin pa dang /lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lus dben pa gang yin
483b7('bum): pa dang /lus ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa
484a1('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
484a2('bum): yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid ngo bo nyid med
484a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
484a4('bum): dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
484a5('bum): mi dmigs so//yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid dben pa'i/
484a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
484a7('bum): yid med pa dang /yid stong pa nyid dang /yid dben pa dang /yid ngo bo nyid med pa lo sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/yid med
484b1('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/yid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
484b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid med pa gang yin pa dang /yid
484b3('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /yid dben pa gang yin pa dang /yid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
484b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
484b5('bum): phrag brgya pa//bam po don lnga pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir
484b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
484b7('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
485a1('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
485a2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
485a3('bum): dmigs so//gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
485a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa dang /gzugs stong pa nyid dang /gzugs dben pa dang /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
485a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/gzugs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma
485a6('bum): yin/gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
485a7('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs med pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gzugs dben pa gang
485b1('bum): yin pa dang /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang
485b2('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sgra med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sgra stong pa nyid
485b3('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sgra ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
485b4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sgra med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs
485b5('bum): so//sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so//sgra ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sgra med pa'i phyir
485b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
485b7('bum): dmigs so//sgra ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sgra med pa dang /sgra stong pa nyid dang /
486a1('bum): sgra dben pa dang /sgra ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sgra med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sgra
486a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sgra dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sgra ngo bo nyid med pa'ong gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang
486a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sgra med pa gang yin pa dang /sgra stong pa nyid
486a4('bum): gang yin pa dang /sgra dben pa gang yin pa dang /sgra ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i
486a5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dri med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
486a6('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
486a7('bum): dri ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dri med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir
486b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dri ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i//
486b2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//dri med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dri dben pa'i
486b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dri ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mI dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
486b4('bum): dri med pa dang /dri stong pa nyid dang dri dben pa dang /dri ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtho' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/dri med pa'ang gzhan ma
486b5('bum): yin/dri stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/dri dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dri ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha'
486b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/phye ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dri med pa gang yin pa dang /dri stong pa nyid gang
486b7('bum): yin pa dang /dri dben pa gang yin pa dang /dri ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
487a1('bum): gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ro med pa'i phyir byang chub
487a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
487a3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//ro ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ro med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so///
487a4('bum): ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so//ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so//ro ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
487a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ro med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so//ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
487a6('bum): mi dmigs so//ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ro ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
487a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ro mod pa dang /ro stong pa nyid dang /ro dben pa dang /ro ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
487b1('bum): dmigs te/ro med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ro stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ro dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ro ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
487b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ro med pa
487b3('bum): gang yin pa dang /ro stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ro dben pa gang yin pa dang /ro ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi
487b4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg
487b5('bum): med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg dben pa'i phyir
487b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'a'i phyi/
487b7('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
488a1('bum): dmigs so//reg ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//reg med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma
488a2('bum): dmigs so//reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//reg ngo bo
488a3('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg med pa dang /reg stong pa nyid dang /reg dben pa dang /
488a4('bum): reg ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/reg med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
488a5('bum): yin/reg dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/reg ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i
488a6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg med pa grang yin pa dang /reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /reg dben
488a7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /reg ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang //
488b1('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
488b2('bum): chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos ngo bo nyid med
488b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
488b4('bum): dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
488b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so//chos
488b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa
488b7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos med pa dang /chos stong pa nyid dang /chos dben pa dang /chos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
489a1('bum): te/chos med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/chos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chos ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang
489a2('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
489a3('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na chos med pa gang yin pa dang /chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chos dben pa gang yin pa dang /chos ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub
489a4('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
489a5('bum): byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa stong
489a6('bum): bopo nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam por shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//migs
489a7('bum): gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
489b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
489b2('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
489b3('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
489b4('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mig gi rnam
489b5('bum): par shes pa med pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
489b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mig gi rnam par
489b7('bum): shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
490a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /mig
490a2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub
490a3('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
490a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
490a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med
490a6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes
490a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i
490b1('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna
490b2('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i
490b3('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang /rna ba'i rnam
490b4('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
490b5('bum): dmigs te/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna
490b6('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
490b7('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i rnam
491a1('bum): par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
491a2('bum): pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus grang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa med
491a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par
491a4('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
491a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
491a6('bum): dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
491a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa meng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
491b1('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
491b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa
491b3('bum): dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin//
491b4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
491b5('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i
491b6('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo
491b7('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
492a1('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam
492a2('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
492a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
492a4('bum): dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
492a5('bum): mi'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
492a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir
492a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan
492b1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
492b2('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/lha'i
492b3('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
492b4('bum): ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes/
492b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi
492b6('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par
492b7('bum): shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
493a1('bum): so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus/rnam par shes pa ngo bo tha~Md med pa'i phyir byang chu
493a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam pa ro shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa
493a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi
493a4('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid meng po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
493a5('bum): dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
493a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shos pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
493a7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon
493b1('bum): byi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin//
493b2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang
493b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi
493b4('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
493b5('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe
493b6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
493b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
494a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam
494a2('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
494a3('bum): so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
494a4('bum): mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
494a5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi
494a6('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
494a7('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin//
494b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mthu'
494b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa
494b3('bum): dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang //
494b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
494b5('bum): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
494b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo
494b7('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig
495a1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
495a2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang
495a3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben
495a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe
495a5('bum): na/tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang /mig gi 'dus te
495a6('bum): reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin//
495a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin
495b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu
495b2('bum): de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus
495b3('bum): te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de
495b4('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
495b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
495b6('bum): dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
495b7('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
496a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te
496a2('bum): reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te
496a3('bum): reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir
496a4('bum): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
496a5('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
496a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
496a7('bum): yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa
496b1('bum): gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
496b2('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa
496b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
496b4('bum): dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
496b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
496b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
496b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
497a1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
497a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
497a3('bum): dben pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan
497a4('bum): ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
497a5('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i
497a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang
497a7('bum): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med
497b1('bum): de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
497b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mo dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med
497b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
497b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo
497b5('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg
497b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa
497b7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa
498a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus
498a2('bum): mi dmigs te/lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce'i
498a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
498a4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lce'i
498a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
498a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i
498a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus
498b1('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
498b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
498b3('bum): dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
498b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
498b5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
498b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /
498b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lus kyi
499a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus
499a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
499a3('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
499a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
499a5('bum): pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
499a6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi
499a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
499b1('bum): dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yod kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mo
499b2('bum): dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
499b3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
499b4('bum): su mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
499b5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
499b6('bum): dben pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang
499b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan
500a1('bum): ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
500a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang
500a3('bum): yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
500a4('bum): pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i
500a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so///
500a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/
500a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig
500b1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub
500b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mig gi
500b3('bum): 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
500b4('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor
500b5('bum): ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /
500b6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa
500b7('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig gi 'dus te
501a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/
501a2('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang
501a3('bum): gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
501a4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
501a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
501a6('bum): mod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
501a7('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
501b1('bum): mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med
501b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
501b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
501b4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i
501b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
501b6('bum): so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te
501b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
502a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
502a2('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rna ba'i
502a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang
502a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
502a5('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
502a6('bum): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
502a7('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i
502b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
502b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpe'i sngon gyi mthor mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
502b3('bum): tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
502b4('bum): dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med
502b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i
502b6('bum): 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
502b7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan
503a1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/
503a2('bum): tshor ba dben pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sna'i 'dus
503a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben
503a4('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
503a5('bum): ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin
503a6('bum): pa dang /sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
503a7('bum): gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin
503b1('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
503b2('bum): dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir
503b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus
503b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/
503b5('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
503b6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i
503b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
504a1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
504a2('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben
504a3('bum): pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
504a4('bum): gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan
504a5('bum): ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi
504a6('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i
504a7('bum): 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
504b1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su/
504b2('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te
504b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
504b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
504b5('bum): ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te rog po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so///
504b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te rig po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
504b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
505a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
505a2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
505a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
505a4('bum): tshor ba dben pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/lus
505a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
505a6('bum): tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi
505a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
505b1('bum): tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi
505b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
505b3('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
505b4('bum): dpa' ston gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
505b5('bum): gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
505b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
505b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
506a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
506a2('bum): bla med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
506a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
506a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
506a5('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
506a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/dbus mi dmigs te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa
506a7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
506b1('bum): yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
506b2('bum): de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
506b3('bum): gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
506b4('bum): pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
506b5('bum): stong phrag brgya pa//bam po don drug pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi
506b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
506b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'o mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
507a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/
507a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
507a3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sna'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
507a4('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams med pa dang /sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /sa'i khams dben pa dang /sa'i khams ngo
507a5('bum): bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sa'i khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
507a6('bum): yin/sa'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
507a7('bum): yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang /sa'i khams stong pa
507b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
507b2('bum): dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub
507b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
507b4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
507b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
507b6('bum): mi dmigs so//chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
507b7('bum): so//chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chu'i khams
508a1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu chu'i khams med pa dang /chu'i khams
508a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chu'i khams dben pa dang /chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/chu'i khams
508a3('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/chu'i khrims dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang
508a4('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
508a5('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na chu'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang /chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa
508a6('bum): gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
508a7('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams stong pa nyid
508b1('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
508b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
508b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
508b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
508b5('bum): su mi dmigs so//me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
508b6('bum): so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mo'i khams med pa dang /me'i khams stong pa nyid dang /me'i khams dben pa dang /me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la ston
508b7('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/me'i khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/me'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/me'i
509a1('bum): khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
509a2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na me'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang /me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin
509a3('bum): pa dang /me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi
509a4('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub
509a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub
509a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub
509a7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub
509b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub
509b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
509b3('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams
509b4('bum): med pa dang /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang /rlung gi khams dben pa dang /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
509b5('bum): dmigs te/rlung gi khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rlung gi khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med
509b6('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe
509b7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rlung gi khams med pa gang yin pa dang /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /rlung gi khams
510a1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin
510a2('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
510a3('bum): so//nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
510a4('bum): dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
510a5('bum): mi'i mthar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
510a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang
510a7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir
510b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i/
510b2('bum): bu nam mkha'i khams med pa dang /nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang /nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang /nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
510b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/nam mkha'i khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/nam mkha'i khams
510b4('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i
510b5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nam mkha'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang
510b6('bum): yin pa dang /nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang
510b7('bum): yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i
511a1('bum): khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
511a2('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
511a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams stong
511a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam
511a5('bum): par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
511a6('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
511a7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA
511b1('bum): ra ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams spang pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med
511b2('bum): pa lnga sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams stong
511b3('bum): panyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
511b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par
511b5('bum): shes pa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes
511b6('bum): pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' glang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa
511b7('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig
512a1('bum): paspyong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig
512a2('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa stong pa
