512a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med
512a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
512a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
512a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ma rig pa med pa dang /ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang /ma rig pa dben pa dang /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid
512a7('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/ma rig pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin//
512b1('bum): ma rig pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha'
512b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa med pa gang yin pa dang /ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ma rig pa dben
512b3('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus
512b4('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
512b5('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed ngo bo nyid
512b6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
512b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpe'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
513a1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
513a2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
513a3('bum): so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang /'du byed stong pa nyid dang /'du byed dben pa dang /'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
513a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/'du byed med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'du byed dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'du byed
513a5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma
513a6('bum): yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed ngo bo
513a7('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
513b1('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong pa
513b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid
513b3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong
513b4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa
513b5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa
513b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ngo
513b7('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
514a1('bum): dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mo dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rnam
514a2('bum): par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang
514a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
514a4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam byar shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang //
514a5('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang
514a6('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
514a7('bum): so//ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
514b1('bum): dmigs so//ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
514b2('bum): dmigs so//ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
514b3('bum): dmigs so//ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
514b4('bum): dmigs so//ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so///
514b5('bum): ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ming dang gzugs med pa dang /ming dang
514b6('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid dang /ming dang gzugs dben pa dang /ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
514b7('bum): te/ming dang gzugs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ming dang gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ming dang gzugs ngo bo
515a1('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
515a2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ming dang gzugs med pa gang yin pa dang /ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ming dang gzugs
515a3('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang /ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma
515a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/skye mched drug med pa'i phyir
515a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug dben pa'i
515a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug med
515a7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpe'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug
515b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug med
515b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang
515b3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
515b4('bum): bu/skye mched drug med pa dang /skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang /skye mched drug dben pa dang /skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'
515b5('bum): mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/skye mched drug med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/skye mched drug dben pa'ang gzhon ma yin//
515b6('bum): skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
515b7('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/skye mched drug med pa gang yin pa dang /skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /skye mched drug dben pa
516a1('bum): gang yin pa dang /skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
516a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
516a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
516a4('bum): mi dmigs so//reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
516a5('bum): so//reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//reg
516a6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//reg pa stong pa nyid
516a7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
516b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/reg pa med pa dang /reg pa stong pa nyid dang /reg pa dben pa dang /reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa
516b2('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/reg pa dben pa'ang
516b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
516b4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang /reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /reg
516b5('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
516b6('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor bu stong pa nyid kyi phyir
516b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
517a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
517a2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/
517a3('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso
517a4('bum): so//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir
517a5('bum): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshor ba med pa dang /tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /tshor ba dben pa dang /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i
517a6('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshor ba
517a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang
517b1('bum): gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba ngo bo nyid
517b2('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
517b3('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sred pa stong pa nyid kyi
517b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
517b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi de migs so//sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
517b6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sbed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor mi dmigs so//sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
517b7('bum): mi dmigs so//sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sred pa
518a1('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe
518a2('bum): nA/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/sred pa med pa dang /sred pa stong pa nyid dang /sred pa dben pa dang /srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'
518a3('bum): mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sred pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sred pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sred pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sred pa ngo bo nyid
518a4('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yini/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma
518a5('bum): yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na sred pa med pa gang yin pa dang /sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sred pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /sred pa ngo bo nyid
518a6('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
518a7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
518b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
518b2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
518b3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
518b4('bum): dmigs so//ldan pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//len pa dben
518b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA
518b6('bum): radwa ti'i bu len pa med pa dang /len pa stong pa nyid dang /len pa dben pa dang /len pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
518b7('bum): dmigs te/len pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/len pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang
519a1('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA
519a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na len pa med pa gang yin pa dang /len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /len pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub
519a3('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
519a4('bum): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
519a5('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so//srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
519a6('bum): mi dmigs so//srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
519a7('bum): srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//srid pa med
519b1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
519b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/srid pa med pa
519b3('bum): dang /srid pa stong pa nyid dang /srid pa dben pa dang /srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/srid
519b4('bum): pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/srid pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems
519b5('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar
519b6('bum): na srid pa med pa gang yin pa dang /srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
519b7('bum): gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang
520a1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
520a2('bum): mi dmigs so//skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//skye ba ngo bo nyid medo pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
520a3('bum): so//skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye ba dben
520a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//skye ba med pa'i phyir
520a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
520a6('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/skye ba
520a7('bum): med pa dang /skye ba stong pa nyid dang /skye ba dben pa dang /skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/
520b1('bum): skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/skye ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang
520b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na skye ba med pa gang
520b3('bum): yin pa dang /skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /skye bo dben pa gang yin pa dang /skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi
520b4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin po dang /dbus gang yin pa dri thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rgyu
520b5('bum): shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi dben pa'i phyir
520b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
520b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'o phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
521a1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//rku shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
521a2('bum): mi dmigs so//rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpo' dbus su mi dmigs so//rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rga shi
521a3('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rga shi med pa dang /rga shi stong pa nyid dang /rga shi dben pa/
521a4('bum): dang /rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rga shi med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
521a5('bum): ma yin/rga shi dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
521a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rga shi med pa gang yin pa dang /rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin
521a7('bum): po dang /rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang /rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i
521b1('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
521b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
521b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mo dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i
521b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
521b5('bum): so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/
521b6('bum): ma'i mthor mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
521b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med
522a1('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha
522a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
522a3('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
522a4('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
522a5('bum): yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /
522a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
522a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
522b1('bum): su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
522b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
522b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
522b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
522b5('bum): phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
522b6('bum): dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
522b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo
523a1('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
523a2('bum): med pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon
523a3('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
523a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin//
523a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA
523a6('bum): radwa ti'i bu/de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
523a7('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang
523b1('bum): yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bzod pa'i pha rol tu
523b2('bum): phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
523b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
523b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
523b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
523b6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i
523b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
524a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha
524a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la ston gyi
524a3('bum): mtha' mo dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
524a4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang
524a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na bzod pa'i
524a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha
524a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang
524b1('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
524b2('bum): mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir
524b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//brtson
524b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
524b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med
524b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus
524b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
525a1('bum): dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
525a2('bum): ti'i bu/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
525a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin
525a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med
525a5('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhon ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
525a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /brtson 'grus
525a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha'
525b1('bum): gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bsam gtan gyi
525b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
525b3('bum): mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
525b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan
525b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
525b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
525b7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam
526a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
526a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa me pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
526a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /khwa sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi
526a4('bum): ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang
526a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
526a6('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa
526a7('bum): ti'i bu/de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
526b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
526b2('bum): dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
526b3('bum): phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
526b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
526b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
526b6('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//shes
526b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
527a1('bum): su mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
527a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir
527a3('bum): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa
527a4('bum): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
527a5('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/shes rab kyi pha
527a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
527a7('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
527b1('bum): glang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa glang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang
527b2('bum): yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do///
527b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po don bdun pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
527b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
527b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
527b6('bum): dpe'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
527b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir
528a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid
528a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir
528a3('bum): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa
528a4('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
528a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon
528a6('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa gang
528a7('bum): yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub
528b1('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
528b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
528b3('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
528b4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/
528b5('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
528b6('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
528b7('bum): dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
529a1('bum): so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang /phye
529a2('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/phyi stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/phyi
529a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems
529a4('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ljon pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
529a5('bum): de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa
529a6('bum): gang yin po dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi mI'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
529a7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi nang
529b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
529b2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
529b3('bum): so//phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
529b4('bum): dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
529b5('bum): su mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
529b6('bum): mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/phyi nang stong pa
529b7('bum): nyid med pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
530a1('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang
530a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i
530a3('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong
530a4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
530a5('bum): dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan
530a6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
530a7('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
530b1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//stong
530b2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
530b3('bum): dmigs so//stong pa nyid spyong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
530b4('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
530b5('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
530b6('bum): bu/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi
530b7('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
531a1('bum): ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang
531a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na stong pa
531a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
531a4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams
531a5('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
531a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
531a7('bum): dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
531b1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
531b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
531b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
531b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
531b5('bum): ti'i bu/chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
531b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/chen po stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid
531b7('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi
532a1('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /chen du
532a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
532a3('bum): pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan
532a4('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dron dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
532a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid
532a6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so///
532a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
532b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
532b2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
532b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa
532b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la
532b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
532b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
532b7('bum): yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na don dam pa stong
533a1('bum): pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /don dam pa
533a2('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus
533a3('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byur med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
533a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i
533a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
533a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'o mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
533a7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
533b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
533b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
533b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
533b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/'dus byas
533b5('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo/
533b6('bum): bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan
533b7('bum): ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus byas stong
534a1('bum): pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang
534a2('bum): yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dus ma byas stong
534a3('bum): pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
534a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
534a5('bum): mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
534a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i
534a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
534b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
534b2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang /'dus ma byas stong
534b3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
534b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'dus ma
534b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
534b6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus
534b7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
535a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byur med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mtha' las 'das
535a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
535a3('bum): dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
535a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das
535a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
535a6('bum): mi dmigs so//mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mtha'o las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i
535a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mtha' las
535b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
535b2('bum): so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
535b3('bum): nyid dben pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' las 'das pa
535b4('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mtha'
535b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
535b6('bum): yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong
535b7('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
536a1('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med du
536a2('bum): gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thog
536a3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
536a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma
536a5('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
536a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma
536a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
536b1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben
536b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i
536b3('bum): phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa
536b4('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/thog
536b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben
536b6('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sdems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang
536b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
537a1('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /zlog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang
537a2('bum): yin pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
537a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dor ba med pa
537a4('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
537a5('bum): dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//drodor ba mod po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
537a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa
537a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
537b1('bum): so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
537b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
537b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
537b4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang /dor ba med pa
537b5('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
537b6('bum): yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med
537b7('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma
538a1('bum): yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa
538a2('bum): dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
538a3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi mI'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa
538a4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rlung bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
538a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid
538a6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthuraro mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
538a7('bum): so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
538b1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
538b2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
538b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa
538b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la ston
538b5('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
538b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang
538b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /rang
539a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
539a2('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang
539a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
539a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo
539a5('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos
539a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
539a7('bum): mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyi de ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir
539b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i
539b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
539b3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa
539b4('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chos thams cad
539b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems
539b6('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na
539b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /chos thams
540a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus
540a2('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
540a3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
540a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan
540a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
540a6('bum): dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mu'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshon nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
540a7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
540b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid
540b2('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /rang
540b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i
540b4('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rang gi mtshan
540b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha'
540b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang
540b7('bum): yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
541a1('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de rnams
541a2('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
541a3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
541a4('bum): mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
541a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mabar mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
541a6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
541a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
541b1('bum): so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
541b2('bum): dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben
541b3('bum): pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang
541b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med
541b5('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe
541b6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben
541b7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang
542a1('bum): yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/
542a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa
542a3('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
542a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
542a5('bum): dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
542a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
542a7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
542b1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /dngos po med pa spyong pa
542b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
542b3('bum): te/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dngos
542b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
542b5('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
542b6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang
542b7('bum): yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
