543a1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
543a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
543a3('bum): dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
543a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
543a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa
543a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
543a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa
543b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te//
543b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo
543b3('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
543b4('bum): no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /
543b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang
543b6('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
543b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
544a1('bum): stong pa nyid dbang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mi migs so//dngos po med pa'i dra ba nyid stong pa nyid ngo ba nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems//
544a2('bum): dpya' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
544a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
544a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
544a5('bum): panyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
544a6('bum): dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
544a7('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i byor zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /
544b1('bum): dam pa med pa'i ngam nyid stong pa nyid snang pa nyid dang /dngos po med de'ajobo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /dngos pa med pa'ong ba ny-id stong pa dang ba nyid myod pa la
544b2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'i mi dmigs/dbus myi dmigs te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong mi
544b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo yin dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang
544b4('bum): rmub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mthu' yang gzhan pa yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bri/de lta ro
544b5('bum): dam po med pa du na ny-id stong pa nyid snying po gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa 'dzim nyid stong ba nyid stong ba nyid gang yin pa dang /dngas pa med pa jo ba nyid myed pa nyid ben pa rlung
544b6('bum): yin pa dang /dngos po yod pa'i dzi ba nyid stong pa nyid pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /spyan gyi myang gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang min/
544b7('bum): padang /dngos gang len pa de rnams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byad med do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong brag 'cha ba//bim po don brgya dang
545a1('bum): du rgyu /dran bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa 'a sngon gyi mapa myo mags s+ho//dz+nyAn pats+tsha bar shig tu stong ba nyid
545a2('bum): nga chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so//dran pa ra bzhag pa dasngon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dza rU pa nye bar bdag pa
545a3('bum): me pa'i phyir byed chu'i sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma migs so//rngan pa nye byer bzhog po med pa'i phyir byung chu sems dpa' bye ma'i mabar mi dmyigs so//
545a4('bum): dag bsno pa nyid kyi phyi byung chu ba sems dbu phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs s+ho//dran pa nye khyer bklog pa de ban du'i phyir byung chub sems pa phyi ma'i myur mi dben
545a5('bum): //dran pa lci bar bzhag pa jo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs ste//dran pa nye bar bzhog pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems da
545a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//rgyun pa nye bar bdage ba sbyong bo nyid kyi phyir byung chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhug pa dubor po'i phyir byang chub sems
545a7('bum): dab dngos su mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ljon pa shA radwa ti'i
545b1('bum): bu/dran pa nye bar bzhug pa med pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dpon pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
545b2('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/dran pa nye ba nga theg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
545b3('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhig pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang
545b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i blo/de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa gang yin pa dang /
545b5('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub
545b6('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mang gang ldan pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
545b7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
546a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i
546a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba stong
546a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag
546a4('bum): par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so///
546a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so///
546a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/yang dag par spong ba med pa
546a7('bum): dang /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang /yang dag par spong ba dben pa dang /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
546b1('bum): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/yang dag par spong ba dben pa'ang gzhan
546b2('bum): ma yin/yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
546b3('bum): ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na yang dag par spong ba med pa gang yin pa dang /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa
546b4('bum): dang /yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
546b5('bum): pa dang /phyi mi'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i
546b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben
546b7('bum): po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi
547a1('bum): rkang pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
547a2('bum): so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
547a3('bum): mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
547a4('bum): su mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
547a5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
547a6('bum): dben pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang
547a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
547b1('bum): yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA
547b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa gang yin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
547b3('bum): rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams
547b4('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dbang po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po stong pa nyid
547b5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
547b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
547b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
548a1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//dbang po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
548a2('bum): dmyigs so//dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//dbang po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de
548a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dbang po med pa dang /dbang po stong pa nyid dang /dbang po dben pa dang /dbang po ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
548a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/dbang po med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dbang po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/dbang po dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dbang
548a5('bum): po ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang
548a6('bum): gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na dbang po med pa gang yin pa dang /dbang po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dbang po dben pa gang yin pa dang /dbang
548a7('bum): po ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams
548b1('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stobs stong pa nyid kyi
548b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
548b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mo dmigs so//stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
548b4('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
548b5('bum): mi dmigs so//stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//stobs
548b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan
548b7('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/stobs med pa dang /stobs stong pa nyid dang /stobs dben pa dang /stobs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs//
549a1('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/stobs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/stobs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/stobs ngo bo nyid med
549a2('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
549a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na stobs med pa gang yin pa dang /stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang /stobs ngo bo nyid med pa gang
549a4('bum): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
549a5('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi
549a6('bum): yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
549a7('bum): so//byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
549b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
549b2('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
549b3('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
549b4('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
549b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag med pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
549b6('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin//
549b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha'
550a1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag med pa
550a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
550a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
550a4('bum): byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i
550a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
550a6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i
550a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
550b1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dpon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag
550b2('bum): brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
550b3('bum): dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i
550b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i
550b5('bum): phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
550b6('bum): lag brgyad pa dben pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/
550b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
551a1('bum): brgyad pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
551a2('bum): yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na 'phags pa'i
551a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa
551a4('bum): grang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
551a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i bden pa
551a6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags
551a7('bum): pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
551b1('bum): dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
551b2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
551b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
551b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i badren pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
551b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i bden pa med pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /
551b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/'phags
551b7('bum): pa'i bden pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa
552a1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
552a2('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
552a3('bum): 'phags pa'i badren pa dben pa glang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
552a4('bum): pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bsam gtan med
552a5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan
552a6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam
552a7('bum): gtan med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam
552b1('bum): gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mu'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gtan
552b2('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir
552b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
552b4('bum): ti'i bu/bsam gtan med pa dang /bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang /bsam gtan dben pa dang /bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i
552b5('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/bsam gtan med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/bsam gtan dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin//
552b6('bum): bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
552b7('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na bsam gtan med pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan dben pa
553a1('bum): gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
553a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
553a3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
553a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
553a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/
553a6('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
553a7('bum): su mi dmigs so//tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
553b1('bum): so//tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ched med pa med pa dang /tshad med pa stong
553b2('bum): pa nyid dang /tshad med pa dben pa dang /tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/tshad med pa med pa'ang
553b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/tshad med pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
553b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na tshad med
553b5('bum): pa med pa gang yin pa dang /tshad med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /tshad med pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
553b6('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe
553b7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
554a1('bum): 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
554a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
554a3('bum): par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
554a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
554a5('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
554a6('bum): so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang
554a7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir
554b1('bum): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
554b2('bum): 'jug pa dben pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/gzugs
554b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
554b4('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
554b5('bum): yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa gang yin pa
554b6('bum): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
554b7('bum): 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de
555a1('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par thar pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
555a2('bum): dmigs so//rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
555a3('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
555a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
555a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
555a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
555a7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
555b1('bum): te'i bu/rnam par thar pa med pa dang /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa dben pa dang /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/bya
555b2('bum): ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rnam par thar pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rnam par thar pa dben pa'ang gzhon
555b3('bum): ma yin/rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
555b4('bum): yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/rnam par thar pa med pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam par
555b5('bum): thar pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' glang
555b6('bum): yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i
555b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
556a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
556a2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
556a3('bum): dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
556a4('bum): 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
556a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i
556a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
556a7('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
556b1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
556b2('bum): 'jug pa dben pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mthar gyis
556b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
556b4('bum): 'jug pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha'
556b5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
556b6('bum): pa med pa gang yin pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang
556b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
557a1('bum): dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
557a2('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
557a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
557a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
557a5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
557a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
557a7('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
557b1('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
557b2('bum): med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
557b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
557b4('bum): so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe
557b5('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /
557b6('bum): smon pa med pa stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
557b7('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
558a1('bum): ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang
558a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
558a3('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang
558a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med
558a5('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
558a6('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang //
558a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
558b1('bum): su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
558b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed
558b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa stong pa
558b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa ngo/
558b5('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa
558b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid
558b7('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mngon par shes pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang
559a1('bum): mngon par shes pa dben pa dang /mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
559a2('bum): te/mngon par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mngon par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mngon par
559a3('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
559a4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na mngon par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mngon
559a5('bum): par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang //
559a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir
559a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir
559b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang
559b2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub
559b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub
559b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
559b5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ting nge
559b6('bum): 'dzin med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang /ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
559b7('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ting nge 'dzin dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ting nge 'dzin ngo bo
560a1('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
560a2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang
560a3('bum): yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus
560a4('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
560a5('bum): dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
560a6('bum): mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
560a7('bum): mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
560b1('bum): mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
560b2('bum): so//gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//gzungs
560b3('bum): kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/gzungs kyi sgo med pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo
560b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/gzungs kyi
560b5('bum): sgo med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/
560b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
560b7('bum): bu/de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo med pa gang yin pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa gang
561a1('bum): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
561a2('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
561a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
561a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs
561a5('bum): pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
561a6('bum): dmigs so//de bzhin gshogs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i
561a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de bzhin
561b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
561b2('bum): dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de
561b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
561b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/de bzhin
561b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan
561b6('bum): ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan
561b7('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
562a1('bum): pa'i stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi
562a2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi
562a3('bum): 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mi
562a4('bum): 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
562a5('bum): mi 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
562a6('bum): mi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
562a7('bum): so//mi 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
562b1('bum): mi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
562b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi 'jigs pa med pa dang /mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang /mi 'jigs pa dben pa dang /mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
562b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mi 'jigs pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/mi 'jigs pa dben pa'ang gzhan
562b4('bum): mamo yin/mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
562b5('bum): yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na mi 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa dang /mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mi 'jigs
562b6('bum): pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
562b7('bum): pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
563a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig
563a2('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so///
563a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
563a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
563a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//so so yang dag
563a6('bum): papopar rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
563a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/so so yang dag par
563b1('bum): rlig pa med pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
563b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/so so
563b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi
563b4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa med pa
563b5('bum): gang yin pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa
563b6('bum): gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
563b7('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi
564a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje chen
564a2('bum): po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje
564a3('bum): chenu po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//snying
564a4('bum): rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//snying
564a5('bum): rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//snying rje chen
564a6('bum): po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/snying rje chen po med pa dang /snying rje chen po
564a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /snying rje chen po dben pa dang /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/
564b1('bum): snying rje chen po med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/snying rje chen po dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin//
564b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
564b3('bum): bu/de ltar na snying rje chen po med pa gang yin pa dang /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa gang
564b4('bum): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
564b5('bum): gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi
564b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
564b7('bum): mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir
565a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so///
565a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
565a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong
565a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//sangs
565a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
565a6('bum): 'dres pa med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa la
565a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
565b1('bum): 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
565b2('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
565b3('bum): de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang
565b4('bum): yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
565b5('bum): gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir
565b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i
565b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings
566a1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos
566a2('bum): kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//chos
566a3('bum): kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings
566a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe
566a5('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chos kyi dbyings med pa dang /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang /chos kyi dbyangs dben pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
566a6('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/chos kyi dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/chos kyi
566a7('bum): dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
566b1('bum): yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na chos kyi dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings stong pa
566b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang
566b3('bum): yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang de bzhin
566b4('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid dben
566b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid med pa'i
566b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
566b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
567a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
567a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
567a3('bum): bu/de bzhin nyid med pa dang /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dben pa dang /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
567a4('bum): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/de bzhin nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/de bzhin nyid dben pa'ang gzhon ma yin/de
567a5('bum): bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus
567a6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na de bzhin nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin nyid dben pa gang
567a7('bum): yin pa dang /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
567b1('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
567b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
567b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub
567b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub
567b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid meng po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir
567b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang
567b7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
568a1('bum): ti'i bu/yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa
568a2('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang
568a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
568a4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' med
568a5('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa
568a6('bum): dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
568a7('bum): gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
568b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
568b2('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i
568b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis
568b4('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
568b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
568b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
568b7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang /bsam
569a1('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbying sang po nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
569a2('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa
569a3('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
569a4('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
569a5('bum): bu/de ltar na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
569a6('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
569a7('bum): dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang nyan thos
569b1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos dben pa'i phyir
569b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub
569b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
569b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
569b5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
569b6('bum): dmigs so//nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nyan thos med pa dang /
569b7('bum): nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /nyan thos dben po dang /nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phye ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/nyan
570a1('bum): thos med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/nyan thos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan
570a2('bum): ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang
570a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang /nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang /nyan thos ngo bo nyid med
570a4('bum): pe gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi mo'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
570a5('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
570a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
570a7('bum): so//rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
570b1('bum): mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
570b2('bum): mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
570b3('bum): su mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
570b4('bum): mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rang sangs
570b5('bum): rgyas med pa dang /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
570b6('bum): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/rang sangs rgyas med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rang sangs rgyas dben pa'ang gzhan ma
570b7('bum): yin/rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang
571a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ltar na rlung sangs rgyas med pa gang yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas sbyong
571a2('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dben pa gang yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon
571a3('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
571a4('bum): ti'i bu/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
571a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa'
571a6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
571a7('bum): so//byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/
571b1('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs s+ho//byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang
571b2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' dben
571b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
571b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
571b5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/byang chub sems dpa' med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub
571b6('bum): sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang
571b7('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA
572a1('bum): radwa ti'i bu/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
572a2('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
572a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang thams
572a4('bum): cid mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
572a5('bum): mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
572a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mau dmigs so//thams
572a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
572b1('bum): mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
572b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
572b3('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid mod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe drang ldan pa shA rang
572b4('bum): tI'i bu/thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon
572b5('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'i mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid
572b6('bum): kyang gzhan mu yin/thums cad mkhyen pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang
572b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' ying gauzhan ma yin/phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
